I blind-bought it early on when I started collecting. I was not upset with it, but I have found many more options that would fill the role of a shower gel-Esque fragrance that I would choose over this one.

6/10

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: This is why bother for me. I get a sharp waft of alcohol when I spray it and when that dissipates there is nothing more than a faint shower gel type smell. I use it sometimes since I bath with natural unscented soap and want to use it up. I dose myself in 6 or 10 sprays as I'm drying off and I smell fresh for a bit. A good shower gel will perform as well but the scent is ok. Not worth much in my opinion though.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Yet another of the many flankers to the classic 1990s aromatic Eternity by Calvin Klein. Eternity Aqua is a great fragrance in it's own right and the scent is more contemporary than the original Eternity. Eternity Aqua is a fresh blue scent with reasonable longevity and performance and a very wearable, pleasant scent that is suitable for most occasions in the warmer months. The opening really catches me with some nice sweet fruity and fresh notes, smells almost unisex and brings to mind a sunny spring day. As the fragrance settles on my skin I detect a little of the pepper and then later in the dry-down it settles to a nice fresh scent with prominent floral and woody notes. For a cheaper fragrance Eternity Aqua is excellent, not an outstanding composition, but a very nice fragrance that has a decent trajectory. I've really enjoyed wearing Eternity Aqua and although the original Eternity for Men is also great and has more nostalgic value for me, I think I now favour Eternity Aqua more. Eternity Aqua lasts a good 6 or 7 hours on my skin and projection is arm length, becoming a more intimate skin scent by the end of the day. A nice summer freshie and excellent value.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I 110% agree with Rockdj's review below.

What I don't think anyone reviewing this now in 2022 realises is that they're smelling almost an entirely different fragrance from when this first came out.

And no I'm not doing the usual Fragrantica "they reformulated this" meme. I have actual proof.

I have two bottles, one I've held onto since 2012, the other from around 2019/2020 (hardly used, you'll soon find out why). The difference is dramatic.

My 2012 bottle is a lot more clearer, cleaner, smoother, and aquatic, and almost has a kind of ever-so-slight sweetness to it that makes you want to bathe in it. The old formulation "cuts" through high humidity and doesn't build up and waft around you. At the time, it was a really sexy smell (it's dated now), and I used to get a ton of compliments on it from women.

My 2019/2020 bottle is almost an entirely different fragrance and can be summed up by two words POWDERY SOAP. A nauseating old man powdery soap smell that is cloying in summer and high humidity. The old formulation "cuts" through humidity and heat, and this newer bottle hangs around you like a stomach-churning powdery musky soap cloud.

My older bottle still has those powdery, musky notes, but it's pulled back BEHIND the clearer, cleaner, aquatic notes. The newer bottle is just boisterous cloying powdery, musky soap... It's gross.

If someone did want to wear the modern version of this, I would actually recommend it as more of a spring scent. The new reformulation is now way too musky and cloying in high-heat and high-humidity situations. I'm an expat working in a highly humid/tropical area of the world, and there's no way I'd want to wear the newer version unless it was to make people gag around me.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Fresh fail safe summer gem, great value and turns heads. Every fragrance buff needs this in their collection!

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Aquatic fresh harika bir parfüm kalıcılığıda çok iyi aqva marine gibi.
Koku:8
Kalıcılık:7

Aquatic fresh is a great perfume, its permanence is very good, just like aqva marine.
Fragrance:8
Longivity:7

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Has a resemblance to Polo Blue but better in my opinion especially for the price, Aquatic with a cucumber opening, easy to pull off, nothing ground breaking but it is decent for what it is, it gets a little more aromatic and greener as it dries down and the patchouli starts to peak out of the base, for a newer Calvin Klein fragrance it seems to have decent longevity on my skin ....if you like Polo Blue and see this one sitting around cheap, it is worth picking up

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: It smells fresh watery. But it is weak you get hints of it here and there but still kinda weak. I like it and overall is a 6.5 out of 10. I smells kinda like nautica voyage and polo blue. Its generic but still good

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: First of all i love this fragrance, i bought it in 2011 it was love at first smell, my bottle was from the very first batch. The fragrance was magnificent with great sillage, projection and longevity. A very nice and a super affordable aquatic fragrance. I got a new 6.8 oz bottle for my collection and what i got is a very downgrade watery fragrance of my beloved Eternity Aqua. I’m really disappointed i can’t believe what they have done to this fragrance, one of the best eternity flankers ever made. I can even barely smell it on my clothes, no projection, nobody commenting about the fragrance… the magic is over. I hope my bottle is the only broken one, if anyone has experienced this feeling with a current batch of eternity aqua, please let us know! Sadly reformulated for worse. 😭

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Watery, airy, fruity, buzzing fragrance in the East Asian style, with enough classic citrus, lavender, and polished woods (and sea salt) for depth and broader appeal. Not normally my style, but really well made and very, very pleasant to wear.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: This fragrance is great if you are looking for a cheap summer time fragrance. If you have more of a budget, you can find much better options than this fragrance. It is a bit generic and smells just like a bar of soap.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: This wasn’t a bad fragrance considering the price point, but all things considered I was more impressed with Aeropostale’s Discover.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: When comes to aquatics both in and out of this price range honestly to me this is a 3.75/5. It may be just for me but this fragrance is pretty synthetic whilst the opening is very pleasing the dry dow is fairly meh. It's a bit too woody and it kind of ruins the vibe of the cologne. I wouldn't recommend buying it unless you have smelled it and liked it. Alternatives that i think are better for both in and out of this price range are Nautica voyage, ADG EDP, Profondo, Missoni Wave, Azzaro Chrome, and Luna Rossa Ocean. Longevity is decent I notice it for u to 5 hrs on my skin more or less on others but it's not terrible. The scent is just kind of average, nice, but there is better.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: @DustyMemphis the idea is to have the scent stay which is why people need to learn to spray on their clothes instead of skin??? That's just wrong in so many ways. While yes, spraying clothing will make a scent last a little longer, but it defeats the the other idk...95% of what a cologne/perfume does. And that is to change and mix with your body chemistry! That does not and will not happen on clothes. If you have a problem with it lasting on skin then you need to look at your skin, It is most likely dried out which cause the alcohol to evaporate quicker and taking the scent with it. Use unscented lotion on your pulse points and where you're gonna spray so your skin is nice and hydrated. Then as the cologne goes through the top notes and middle notes and base, it will mix with your body chemistry truly unleashing the potential in the scent. This is also why we spray on pulse points because fragrances react to heat. Also another reason why wearing a good summer fragrance outside in the sun will radiate with goodness!

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Fresh, bit soapy, very neutral. The scent itself is pleasant but imo it lacks of personality. I totally get the Eternity DNA, though. I guess it's perfect for anyone who wants to smell fresh and clean after a shower and keep it intimate.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Can't see how anyone would like this ! This is one of the worst fragrances I've ever smelled!!. Plus tha smell stayed on my jacket for over a week. 👎👎😠😡

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I like it more than a lot of aquatics, because it eschews the salty and metallic notes for more of a green backdrop. Unlike flankers that are related to the OG in name only, you can definitely tell this is in the Eternity line. Which may be a good thing to you or not. I think if you like Eternity and want to continue that style into summer, this is your inexpensive ticket to do that. Performance, as stated by others, is below average.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Smells a grade below generic, this stuff literally makes me depressed because of how boring and uninspiring it is. Black pepper and a nasty chlorine type chemical smell. I use this as toilet freshener.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Very similar to Polo Blue as everyone says.
Not the same though, and if PB’s up your street there’s no reason not to own both.
Aqua I find very slightly heavier and quite a lot longer lasting. That alone makes it better value. Often I get a whole working day out of it.
The plumb and lotus really shine on this one for me. The note it shares with Polo Blue, cucumber, is fleeting.
It has that slight touch of old school soap that tends to be standard with all Eternity’s I’ve smelled.
Quite thin on the ground now, so if you come across it, I recommend you pick it up.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
TLDR: This scent is more suited for men above the age of 25, it is a outdated smelling scent.

Opening: It is creamy on opening with large amounts of synthetic floral and aquatic notes. Very fresh smelling, similar to a lavender Lysol spray. The separation of notes is poor, to my nose I can only pick out two or three of the listed notes.

Drydown: Upon drydown it warms up a bit with a soapy dryer sheet type of vibe. Longevity is poor while projection is strong for the first hour. Grassy notes come forward a bit during the drydown. Lasts about 4 hours total on my skin, the strong projection combined with the synthetic smell is a bit nauseating. It smells like something my grandmother might wear.

In conclusion there are better aquatic/fresh fragrances out there, for the price paid ($34) it is not worth the money. A better "fresh" fragrance at a cheaper price would be Midnight Voyage by Nautica or Versace Eau Fraiche for a bit more money, both smell more modern and higher quality.

Score: 5/10

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: A smoother Polo Blue

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Great fresh blue/aqua fragrance.
So far this is the best Eternity and maybe the best of all CK fragrances.
Safe choise for any situations during the day.
However, too boring for the night.
9/10

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: One of the best aquatic fragrances on the market these days. Decent longevity and a nice shower-gel odor with a musky background fit for a gym session, going to bed, cruising in your home or just pulling-off your daily errands. Great if you're into smelling relatively neutral –say a simple, clean soap bar that's not overbearing–. Superb value given the low-price tag. On the negative side, Eternity Aqua for Men lacks character and will probably go unnoticed; don't socialize or go out clubbing with this stuff, you'll disappoint anyone you meet.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Would be a great scent if the bottle didn't come with a defective nozzle that doesn't work

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: no fragrance i dislike more than this … it’s absolutely nauseating to me

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Very nice refreshing Summer fragrance, smells beautiful. However, I would never buy it again because it lasts for 2 hours max then becomes a skin scent, spillage and projection are very weak. I've hear many people comparing this to Polo Blue, I personally think this isn't anywhere near quality/ class of Polo Blue. I wanted a half decent Summer cheapie, I should have gone with Chrome Aqua.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Its a good perfume for summer days. Fresh and fruity smell.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Eternity Aqua is a fresh glass of refreshing beverage in a hot summer day. It is a prescription to fight the effect of high temperature on your body and mind. Go grab one now you'll never regret it.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: If you are looking for an easy reach that works in any situation, especially in summer, casual, office etc....and want something less than $30.....Hard to beat Eternity Aqua for a light blue scent with the ADG vibe, and performance is much better than expected. I get a full day out of this, 4 sprays, and it's good from opening to dry down. Opening cucumber is mixed right, not too much, and just a touch of spice to give it some character. One of the better light blue clean and fresh scents, nothing ground breaking, but it works and will be enjoyed by anyone around you. I feel this is more similar to ADG than Polo Blue, but I can see why some people get the same vibe, it's similar...Similar to dozens of aquatic scents, but is a bit unique and not worn by alot of people....This is a sleeper.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I can't get enough of this scent DNA, but the performance is abysmal. I understand it is a cheapie, but I think Acqua di Gio lasts longer, which is pretty pitiful.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Not that similar to RL Polo Blue as the other reviews here would have you believe.
They are in the same ballpark, both are fresh, aquatic, very early 2000s, kind of generic scents. But Eternity Aqua has a very prominent spicy plum note that is always present and you won't find it in Polo Blue. I don't think smelling one of these fragrances gives you that good of an idea what the other is like.
Don't get me wrong! I enjoy both of them for different reasons, but they just don't feel that similar to me.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
This is a great clean masculant scent. It is a clean, soapy, fresh spicy, aquatic scent for the spring and summer. It is excellent for the price. I really like this as a casual wear, for the office, or a daily for the year. A scent that will make people be pleased to smell you.

Longetivity: 82/100

Projectivity: 80/100

The scent: 86/100

0verall: 83/100

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Polo blue at a fraction of the cost. Moderate Everything in scent and performance. Not bad but just an ok dumb reach freshie. Nice sharp aquatic scent with some roundness with the cucumber, thank goodness not too much cucumber. If you need to run errands in the spring or summer this will do as a casual scent. I got a 3.4oz tester for $16 so it was worth it.

7/10 overall

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Very pleasant and soapy smooth with a slight green edge to it. The cucumber and lavender work great together in Eternity Aqua. Similar but not extremely close to Polo Blue EDT, this is smoother and more (not overly) soapy. One spray behind each ear and one on the back of my neck and I'm still smelling myself 7 hours later when moving around in air conditioned building. If you are indoors this is a year round daytime scent. Spent $22 for a 100ml and for that price range I'd have to give it a 8.5/10 overall. You won't smell special but you'll smell very nice.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I grew up wearing Eternity and I picked this up when it was introduced. I confess it's a sentimental keepsake for me. It's easy to wear, very inexpensive, it's nicely blended, and it's a compliment getter with good or better projection. It isn't as complex as niche or some more daring designers but it works well for a refreshing easy going attractive summer scent.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I picked up a 200ml bottle of this for 31 bucks and I must say that this fragrance is amazing,it smells like 20% polo blue 75% acqua di gio 5% plum and lavender,imho this smells better than them all and the longevity is about 7 hours and great projection,the only thing i hate about this frag is that its super underrated and that I didn't find it sooner.......peace

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I'll keep this simple; this scent is lovely, fresh and soapy. Longevity is not bad as I get 5hrs+ and the projection is about 4—5ft. The smell is very pleasant and enjoyable. 7 out 10 for me!

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I really like this unassuming little fragrance.

For me it manages to be both inoffensive and interesting, and it's proved to be useful in lots of different situations; principally as a safe, clean work scent and as a relaxing before-bed lavender scent. I initially bought it for the cucumber note, which I love, but I'd say that all of the top and mid notes are detectable, and enjoyable.

People have already highlighted the key characteristics - airy, salty, clean, casual. It has a green side as well as a musky side, and also a slight beachy aspect, like sun-bleached driftwood. Really impressive for £20/100ml.

EDIT: The dry down is also really good. Musk is there, and there is a faint version of Guaiac wood, coming across as more of a bleached, sandy driftwood. Totally casual and laid back.

2nd Update: Having put this away for a couple of years, I've worn it this week in sunny, 28 degree heat. In that setting it's an absolute banger. Like being splashed with azure, salty water, then settles down to musk with hinds of plum. So good in the heat!!

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
THE GOOD: aquatic, light, masculine. Will not offend anyone
THE BAD: kind of an “old man” type of scent to my nose
RATING: 7/10
BLIND BUY: yes

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
CK Eternity Aqua is a SWEET-FLORAL-SOAPY-AQUATIC

Starts out moderately sweet and floral almost perfumish (like the og CK Eternity), then a salty marine accord is added in along with some light soapyness (soapy like the og CK Eternity, just not as bold); once it dries the sweetness and floralness turns down some (but is still noticeable), the light soapyness it still there but the saltiness becomes faint as clean and airy light musk comes in, the dry smells very similar to CK Eternity Air just airy and clean; It's a tad sweet and a bit floral but it's a good clean smelling mass appealing fragrance. People are saying it's similar to Polo Blue... I'd say Polo Blue is more masculine, less sweet, and more blue-aquatic. To me CK Eternity Aqua smells similar to Lacoste L.12.12 Bleu Powerful, both are sweet-floral aquatics, however, Eternity Aqua is more mature and marine-salty aquatic while L.12.12 Bleu Powerful is more youthful sweet blue/bleu-sport-aquatic.

Projection/Sillage: GOOD, not a 'beast mode' projection monster but is very aromatic w/ good 'scent bubble' for about 3-4 hours that radiates within 7 feet

Performance/Longevity: GOOD, will last on avg about 7-8 hours

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I kind of see the similarities to Polo Blue but this fragrance isnt as boring. Its a nice aquatic, airy, salty fragrance. Cucumber is very noticeable and lovely, and the green notes and lavender mix very well. Smells very nice and clean for the hot months. I'd rotate this out with my other aquatics in the summer no doubt. Its not the most unique smell in the book but youd be hard pressed to find someone say they dont like it. Easy to go nose blind to though

Scent: 7/10
Longevity: 5/10
Projection: 5/10
Versatility: 7/10 Any time during warmer months
Price Value: 8.5/10 Can be had cheap, superior to what it clones
Overall: 7/10

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: There are a time and a place for almost every type of fragrance, and this is the simple, relaxing, fresh, enjoyable, none offensive, and none artistic type of everyday scent. Polo Blue vibe at a fraction of the price.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: love aqua eternity got a big 6.4 bottle and a 3.4 . it smells like fresh melons cucumber and polo blue . i like it better then polo blue because it has a more freshness to it like your on a beach somewhere where polo blue fails a lil.. 2016 2017 reviewed bottles

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
The first time I smelled this fragrance it was too salty/stenchy, I don't really know the word for it, but it was quite unpleasant for me to smell, but as I try it more it kind of grows into me, I started to notice the freshness and I like it.

It's fresh and calming, good scent to wear during the daytime, in the office, school, or just casual activities during a quite hot daytime, nothing outstanding but it does its job.

Sillage is average in my opinion, not too striking on the nose but not too subtle as well, for the longevity it's kind of weak to moderate.

7/10.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: The first time I used I was dissapointed. The sillage I though was poor but as the day wore on this fragance came back fron the dead with nice aromas of summer beach vibes. To me this a better smelling version of Acqua di Gio.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: For the price, just go for any Nautica fragrance, same freshness and longivity at a fraction of the cost.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Has a nice freshness, nice pepper, nice dryness and sweetness but would I'd like it more if it was a little less sweet. I like using it after a shower, a few sprays on each arm and a couple on the neck and a couple more sprays a couple of hours later cause why the hell not.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I used to use Bod Man fragrances in high school and I bought this a few years ago when I found it reminded me of their Blue Surf scent. It’s pleasant but pretty generic and is fairly unmemorable. In the years since I got it I’ve worn it maybe a total of 6 or 7 times. Doesn’t mean it isn’t worth getting, but for me it hasn’t stood out almost at all compared to other scents in my collection.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Oh this is good! You need this for summer because there will be days when you want something light but still smells really good.

And this is it!

The smell is not as short-lived as I thought.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I bought this in 2016 and loved it.I got about 5 hours on my skin I was more than happy with it.
I just received a tester bottle from fragrancebuy.ca and sprayed 2 sprays and 30 mins later it's nearly vanished?

THAT is the difference between the original being made in France and my current bottle being made in Germany? WTF do Germans know about frags(besides Mercedes who make quality stiff)

Just saying I am very disappointed ,WHY does everything good never last? Why mess with a great daytime casual frag? Greed that's why! :(

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Good smelling....but doesn't last long enough. I paid $33 cad for a 50 ml.

And I get 15-20 mins (2 sprays) before it's a skin scent.

Maybe I need to spray 5+
But even then not worth it for me personally.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
It opens up with a watery surge of cucumber, lotus, and green notes. As it dries down on my skin, the pepper starts to stand out with some faint woods in the background.

I'm not sure how I feel about the pepper in this fragrance. It kind of clashes with the smooth/watery vibe that the majority of this fragrance is centered around.

It's not too bad. I enjoy the opening a lot. It doesn't last too long though.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Very disappointed with another CK, at least in mi skin it last less than 1 hour and the smell is nothing special, very generic and not special at all.

Not for me.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Ck eternity aqua is good for hot weather.I t safe sense for use every Day in the office.I like open notes that make me fresh.Base notes on my skin about 5-6 hr.also light and still fresh.

It s like other common fresh fragrance group.Eg.Polo blue, Aqua di GIO GiorgioArmani.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Quite possibly one of the best affordable freshies out there. It's really nothing like the Polo, this is a soft elegant fresh aquatic that projects moderate and performs for about 4 hours. For the price, it is absolutely acceptable. I have a vintage bottle from 10 years ago, not sure if there's any difference in the scent itself nowadays, but I enjoy it non the less. It's very clean and fresh. Nothing to complain about here.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Not bad for hot, humid summers. This is what I wear when this get warm and muggy and I just want to smell fresh around the house or outdoors (think late-night 4th of July fireworks with the family). This is a classic crowd pleaser and gets compliments as much as more expensive scents do at other times of the year.

In the office, however, I find this to be rather forgettable (the strongest note is cucumber, after all). Anywhere you have dry, climate-controlled air you'll get nothing but top notes. Thus the scent doesn't come across as complex or interesting as others I have tried.

The best thing I like about Eternity Aqua is how fresh and natural it smells. You can use this for just about any situation if you wanted, I just think there are much better options for signature scents. For me this is a niche summer scent for chilling at home or with friends and family. For work, nights out, and cold weather I would have others to choose from.

Overall: recommended if you want to smell like you spent the day at a spa and want to blend in, not stand out.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Bad Bad smell....... one of the those perfumes who Makes people turn Off the head and go away ASAP..... my rating 30/100

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: great summer scent. i very much like it

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Very fresh and uplifting cucumber and some citrus on the top.. i cant say i smell the spices.. if its there its very faint.. it smells like nautica voyage the most.. i dont think this smells like polo blue.. polo blue is more spicy to me.. moderate performance all around.. not a bad scent.. good for very hot weather to freshen you up.. i prefer nautica voyage over this one.. to me voyage has more sparkle and the drydown has prominent musk that i kinda like.. both are cheap and smell synthetic but very nice indeed..

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Clearly derivative of Polo Blue, Eternity Aqua manages to be a funner and more enjoyable wear on my skin, pushing the cucumber note so essential to Southeast Asian sensibilities of refreshment and cooling. Aqua performs well, smells like the Gulf coast beaches of Sarasota and Bradenton with a dose of fresh sliced cucumber in a glass of fizzy Sprite, and makes for an interesting balance of citrus, green and aquatic. While performance isn't remarkable, moderate in both sillage and longevity, I reach for this far more frequently than Polo Blue because it's less perfume like in its overall accord and wears more naturally with more quality than one would assume. A very good bargain fragrance that works effectively as a summer staple and signature.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: If you smell rotten egg, then there's something wrong with your nose. Gorgeous scent start to finish, cool, refreshing, summery, watery, everything that makes for a great summer frag. Lifting, hanging by the pool, running errands, just great for any and all casual situations

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Underrated fragrance that has depth. Definitely put cucumber on my radar. Wife loves it on me. Signature scent for the longest time. Powerhouse for sillage and longevity. If sprayed too aggressively can fill a room. Closest I have smelled to it is D&G light blue pour Homme. Light Blue just doesnt have the bite/freshness of the cucumber. Both drydowns are almost identical on my skin. For me, backup bottle worthy.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: This should not be an Eternity flanker, but CK just release all of their fragrances as flankers instead of their own entity. It should be called CK makes watered down ADG. Glad I didn’t buy a full size bottle of this. I bought the 1 oz. for around $10 on eBay. I remember liking one of these Eternity flankers when I tried it at Macy’s. Must have been Eternity Air. Oh well. I was looking for some summer/aquatic frags. This was a semi blind miss. But for $10 bucks it was ok.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: If you like Polo Blue you'll love this. Slightly fresher with 7-8 hours longevity. A great gym or errand running fragrance for a Man not a Boy.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: So far the only floral perfume for men that I highly appreciate. I am more into aquatic and woody oriental scents but I like this one. The lavender opening is unmistakable and it is not offensive nor synthetic. Has also one of the great and memorable drydowns. Easily earns 8 out of 10 rating.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: good for summer won't give you headache so that's a plus

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: i dont like it.. it smells like old men cologne that old spirit water grandpa use to splash on... except this doesnt even last as long as gramps spirit water geex calvin get your act together!! geez

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Well this gem is so underrated, if this juice was in Dior,Chanel or dolce and gabbana bottle it would have got more talk. I infact like this more than Dolce and Gabbana light blue intense pour homme. This will always be in my collection for summers

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
It has a cooling effect. At least every time I had it on. I guess that’s what marine fragrances do. I wore it both on hot and cold days and it was lovely and I had awesome compliments too. Someone walked up to me saying,”I can guess what you are having on, INVICTUS”. This is was way back in 2014, so I guess the batches of the Invictus’ smelled similar at the time.

I like it.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Sprayed this on at the department store and literally walked 40 feet and was approached by a woman who politely asked, "What the hell are you wearing?!!" I was shocked and a bit embarrassed, because I thought that my sense of smell had failed me and that I had sprayed on a "stinker." However, she went on to tell me, "I want MY man to smell like THAT!!!" Long story short...a better version of Polo Blue that smoothly fades into an interesting-but-unavailable version of Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Giò. VERY NICE, especially for the $20 bucks that I paid for it. It stayed strong on my skin for about 4 1/2 hours. It's probably a monster on clothing. Spring and Summer only with this one, guys. It fits those seasons perfectly.

BEWARE: As I said before...I got only 40 FEET away from the tester and a pretty, young thing approached me without hesitation. I'm quite sure you get the picture.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Quick description: A mix of Polo Blue and Acqua di Gio. ULTRAFRESH, PROFESSIONAL, SUMMER, "COOL AS A CUCUMBER" FRAGRANCE. This was a very expensive fragrance when it was first released that you can now find for cheap as chips.
Voted by me as the best sub $25 fragrance.
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I detect a huge vibe of Polo Blue , fresh,green,soapy and a litle sweet.
I paid 25€ for 100ml

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Eternity Aqua is a very fresh fragrance. Fruity and citrus with a touch of aquatic. I just discovered it in 2018 and I love it. Perfect for the summer months. Lasts a long time on me. I'm glad I purchased it.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Awesome punchy EDT.

I forgot I had this - I had a small bottle in my car arm rest for emergencies. I put it on in the dark and had to remind myself what this was.

Better than average budget Aquatic Ozonic - most reviews here are spot on.

A relief as the Plum and Cucumber punch strongly through for a fair bit making a change from the usual dominant citrus blends. Ozonic and a bit green - a bit salty. The pyramid here is somewhat fair.

Disagree with poor silage comments - if you think this doesn't project something is wrong - with decent 4 hours or so longevity.

I also own Eternity which is fairly safe - this is genuine flanker that has enough spin to justify keeping it next to the original as well for a hotter day! I also have no problem switching this between my Green Irish Tweed or say my Bulgari Aqua or Aqua Marine Tonique.

Again, fairly smooth for the price, if it is about budget or freshness for a change you won't regret this even as a blind buy.

Happy Smelling

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: A small 0.5 ounce bottle of this came with a 3.4 ounce of original Eternity. I was just testing it out and didn't like the open at all. I'm not for sure I like the smell of cucumbers unless eating them. The strange thing for me is I love the Acqua di Gio line, especially Essenza, Profumo and the basic version. This Eternity Aqua takes on a very similar scent during drydown as those AdG do. I keep smelling jasmine but there's no jasmine listed. I only notice it because I wear the AdGs a lot in spring so either I have AdG seeping from my pores or something in this creates a jasmine scent. It's not bad at all. Doesn't smell as refined as the AdG jasmine but it would be a good spring/summer scent for those looking for a cheaper alternative to AdG.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Starts off smelling extremely similar to Polo Blue, with very prominent cucumber along with a bit of citrus. This fragrance leans very masculine. About 30 minutes in, it enters the drydown and becomes a spicy cucumber (the spice here being schezuan pepper), however the opening lasts much longer if sprayed on clothes. The drydown then ends up smelling like plums and schezuan pepper along with mild notes of citrus. The cucumber has totally disappeared at this point. It's a pleasant scent and very spicy. It smells like I have some good-smelling hot sauce on my body - as weird as that sounds, it smells pretty nice; this is due to the heavy shezuan pepper note which is perfectly blended with the plum note. Basenotes smell similar to the drydown. Sillage is moderate but leaning strong - I can still smell wafts of it hours after spraying - and longevity is also moderate at about 4-5 hours. Overall it's an interesting and pleasant fragrance, though I wish the cucumber note lasted longer and I think the shizuan pepper note is a bit strange in a fresh fragrance, while plum note though rare isn't the most appealing to me. Ultimately decided I didn't like it because the pepper is so realistic it feels like I have hot sauce on my skin - though some will enjoy that (kind of like the opposite of the cooling sensation of mint).

3.5/5

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: This is just so similar to Polo Blue, it's unbelievable.. I was so disappointed!

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Not ground breaking, but it's a very pleasant, fresh, safe, somewhat generic summertime aquatic. I like wearing this one while I'm kicking back on the patio, and enjoying a few cold ones with friend's.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Update 2017-12-22 Performe really well, even in the winter. +8 hours now and counting. It stays fresh through the whole day. Thumbs up!

Superfresh cucumbery and watery fragrance. Much better and juicier than Polo Blue, in my opinion. Also better longevity. Spring/summer in a bottle! Or just to smell good at the office.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Typical summer/aquatic scent: fresh, pleasant, watery . In the first 30 minutes. Then comes the nothing, only the soapy-watery notes. And it has the same problem as most of the summer scent: terrible sillage, with poor longevity. If you overdose the fragrance (6-8 sprays in every 2-3 hours), it will be great, but if you use only 3-4 sprays the scent will dissapear in the summer heat 1 hours later… The top note is the best part of the scent. I can sniff some citruses and cucumber (mixed with calone). Because of the cucumber the top smells similar than Ralph Lauren Polo Blue. In the mid I can smell a little bit of pepper with lavender, and the weak base contains some patchouli and sandalwood. After the drydown you really feel, the hard soapy-watery notes, but unfortunately, I don’t want to smell like soapy water. The perfume is a little bit unique with the cucumber note, but nothing special, not worth the money

- Typical summer, daytime scent

- The sillage is under the average, longevity is maybe around 4-5 hours

- Safe blind buy

Scent (open, top-mid): 7/10 (x2)
Scent (drydown, base): 5/10 (x2)
Sillage: 4/10
Longevity: 4.5/10
Uniqueness: 7/10
Versatility: 6/10

Total: 5.688/10

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
This is a great scent at a great price point !

Eternity aqua is a fresh out of the shower smell that's a green smelling aquatic that's very light,airy and refreshing but in the base it does has some depth with the sandalwood and musk. This is a great casual scent for the warmer temperature and is also office friendly as long as you don't go over 5 sprays as this can get cloying although it smells very light.

A lot of people complain about performance issues but on me this has great performance as the first hour and a half I get very good projection and then for the duration of the scent you get a nice scent bubble but the best thing about the performance is that this leaves a nice sillage trail. Longevity on me is 5-8 hours !

Scents that this is very similar to are Polo Blue,Cool Water and sometimes there's notes that come out that slightly remind me of Just me by Paris Hilton which is an ADG clone. Also this does smell kind of similar to the original eternity but only once you get to the drydown does it show similarities. But if you hated the original I would say to still give this a shot because there not all that similar

Overall rating---7.5 out of 10 ! I think this is a great scent for the summer and 1 that will get you a few compliments

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: It smells so much like the Eternity Summer from 2005 or 2006 it is very fresh, sweet, and aquatic but unfortunately it doesn't last that long, I still like it a lot though

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Eternity Aqua is a "safe-bet" fragrance. I'd say you'd be hard pushed to find anyone that finds it offensive.

Fresh and mild, has a salty ocean vibe that makes it good for summer or stuffy environments (such as offices etc).

As pleasant as it is personally i find it has a lack of character, a lot of aquatics smell similar to this. clearly a decision was made in Aqua's conception and marketing to be as far-reaching and appealing as possible.

If found on offer it might be worth a punt, to use a musicians terminology it's a crowdpleaser, something everyone has come across before.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I'm from review Indonesian

Pertama yg tercium wangi timun . Dari top note sampe base note.
Segar . Bersih. Tapi tidak ada maskulin. Cocok untuk pergi ke gym . Karena tidak bikin pusing di sekitar

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Ok I hate the original Eternity because it smells like bug spray on my skin but this formulation here is THE SHIT!!! I wore this to the office & many people were giving compliments. It's pretty loud on my skin & it lasted approx 5-6hrs- I AM SATISFIED

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Light, clean, fruity, mildly classy. Weak in the longevity category but smells very nice. Not enough of a soapy clean sent to wear to the gym, more for running errands in shorts or even lounging at home. Reminds me a lot of the original Eternity For Men. If you like the original, you'll probably like this aquatic fresh version.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
My ex wore this, always by spraying only once. Wish he had used two or three sprays.
I liked it so much that I blind bought the Eternity Aqua for women version which I wear often.
Eternity Aqua for men is sexy, yet comforting. It sits close to the skin.
I might buy it to wear myself.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Awesome clean fragrance. My brother uses this and I think it suits people with a happy go lucky personality. It doesn't suit the word sexy, but more to a smell of a young men exploring the sea? And it reminded me of seaweed too. Lol.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Too weak, not a scent that will grab my attention. Probably a very safe scent but this is not what I am needing.

To be honest, I never smelled it after putting it on. It immediately became a skin scent and I could smell it faintly on my skin but no projection or sillage at all.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Simply an awesome fragrance! Clean, fresh and aquatic startup through with cucumber, citruses and lavender presents it pretty alluring. Dry down is full of calm when musk and sandalwood are elevated. Safe fragrance to wear in office; has longevity of office-timing (8Hrs). It's compliments getter and best deal for daily use in summer.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Strange opening!
I Love the drydown... Very fresh and warm at the same time, like a summer night by the beach,laundry softener smell, but i can't stand the initial blast, reminds me of Donna Karan Delicious Red.. I sense a coffe note in it. Also it's sharp at the first hour.
I like, but only if i can skip the top notes :)

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: This is virtually Polo Blue. Eternity Aqua just has the rare plum note and a bit of spice from the pepper note. I understand fragrances do smell alike but this is if not making a similar fragrance to Polo Blue, it is an attempt at cloning the fragrance. If you have Polo Blue, this is a redundant purchase. If not, and you like semi-aquatic scents, this isn't a bad pick. I just know for me that until I am out on Polo Blue, this is a fragrance I have no reason to get.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Bought the spray at Wal-Mart for $13. EXCELLENT investment, and this stuff REALLY lasts on me. I'm quite pleased, and recommend it to anyone who desires to smell clean.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Very nice, lower cost option to Polo Blue....terrific summer cheapie from the CK house.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Enak bgt ni dipakai buat ngantor. Tapi sayang cmn tahan 3-4 jam di baju trus di kulit cmn 2 jam.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
scent : 8/10
sillage : 6/10
longevity :6/10
100% day fragrance
reminds me of polo blue
nice aquatic and cucumber scent

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Just finished this one... to me, it's A nice safe aquatic fragrance from the CK House.

Worth the buy to have for a day you just want to throw something on, but, not something that I think is a "must run out" for.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: It's your basic aquatic themed cologne and I like it but the sillage is miserable and the only reason I bought it was because it was incredibly cheap.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: This is a nice fragrance...very fresh and pleasant. But there's really nothing special about it. Its one of those "smelled it before" type fragrances. It reminds me of the fragrance section of a department store. For me this has basically become my cologne to waste when i need to quickly run some errands and Im not so fresh and need an Italian shower. (Im italian so i can say that LOL)

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
This perfume has a very strong ozonic note to it I personally don't love it but I like it very much as it projects good and its fresh, it projects decent around 3-5 hours at day but at night the sillage is weak compared to day time.

The most beautiful thing about this fragrance is that ladies do give compliments whenever I wear it, It makes me feel more confident on a date :D

Regards
Kapil

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I probably would have never tried Eternity Aqua but at an airport I saw a gentleman next to me going through security pull a mini bottle of it out while emptying his pockets. He smelled nice so I gave it a shot.

It is a bit similar to Polo Blue to me but not quite. It has a cooler feel to it than most aquatics. I think that's the cucumber note though it doesn't smell quite like cucumber to me. It's nice. I get better longevity with this than Polo Blue and some other aquatics, get 6-8 hours it.

The wife who only enjoys fresh scents has commented positively when I wear this.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I had it yesterday. It has very good smell. But i don't like sillage and longevity.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
After spending more time with this fragrance I really have come to appreciate this !

The opening is very reminiscent of Polo Blue as it has a very crisp,cucumber,somewhat sharp, opening with black pepper in the background.

Even though the opening is great it does smooth out in the mid and in the mid is where this does have some similarites with the original eternity. The reason this has similarites is that it does start to go from being Polo Blue into smelling like a outdoorsy/green scented laudry sheet type of smell. (Actually when I wore this I was getting confused to what the smell around me was because when I put my clothes in the dryer I did use green/outdoorsy dryer sheets and didnt know if it was the dryer sheet smell or the cologne) But sure enough 4 hours later I smelled my arm and yes it was the cologne !!!

My girlfriend did NOT like this when I 1st sprayed it and even she thought it was Polo Blue(She thinks Polo Blue smells like nasty old spice,lol) but 1 hour later she said I changed my mind and I really like that 1 !!!
And for her thats awesome because she hates most of my frags !

Performance on this is great but also deceiving ! This lasts anywhere from 6-10 hours and projects great. One thing to be cautious of is that this is a scent that you will become nose blind too and even when you think the scent is gone others around you will still smell this so PLEASE use this stuff with caution. 3-4 sprays MAX as anymore than that and it starts to become cloying.

Overall rating im staying solid at an 8 out of 10 ! Great scent thats great for everyday use and this stuff has great performance as well which is rare for a freshie

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
First initial review:

To me this smells like a BETTER version of Polo Blue. Polo Blue was a great scent but I always wish the cucumber note was more pronouced as it gave the scent a refreshing quality and I also wished it didnt have as much spice as it kind of made Polo Blue a little lackluster. (still a good scent though)

This scent though is a big step up though as the cucumber is a lot more crisp and pronounced giving this scent a very refreshing quality and then once this dries down it becomes a little more warm as the lavender and green notes kick in but throughout the life of the fragrance it still keeps that freshness from the cucumber unlike in Polo Blue where you get an amazing opening but then shortly in the heart it becomes really muddy and dull smelling.

Performance on this is great for a fresh scent ! This projects really well and lasts 6-8 hours !

Id have to rate this an 8 out of 10 upon the first wearing ! I may rate this higher when i wear it more and I can see this being a staple in my freshie/summer/spring rotation

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: تصور نفسك وانت تسير ثم يُخيّل لك انك شممت رائحة جميلة لا تستطيع معرفة مكانها ولا وصفها

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
This is my first CK fragrance and indeed it is a very well blended fragrance.

When people compared this to Polo Blue, I really wanted to buy this since I lost my Polo Blue under stupid circumstances. I don't know what is it with Ralph Lauren fragrances, they are obscenely overpriced even if discounted!

Yes, they are in the same vein, but compared to Polo Blue, Eternity Aqua is lighter, soapier, smoother and a tad thinner(not a bad thing). If you think about it, Polo Blue is quite strong especially with the metallic/ozonic qualities of its scent. Not so with Eternity Aqua. The ozone quality is dialed way down that not many people will find this cloying/in-your-face/offensive so this can be worn anytime be it in the office, engaging in casual activities, running errands or just hanging out.

Honestly speaking, Eternity Aqua is one of those fragrances that will smell familiar to you but you can't quite put a finger. On certain stages of its lifespan, this can give vibes of: Versace Pour Homme(after about 10 minutes, I currently have this), AXE PHOENIX(had this), L.12.12 Bleu or Vert(cannot remember), Kenneth Cole Reaction and CK One Summer 2013 (who knows what else!). In short, it is not that unique.

Make no mistake about it, this is a true aquatic but can easily be worn all year through since it can bring freshness when one so desires, which is really the point of using an aquatic anyway.

I acquired this blindly in the hopes that this would replace my Polo Blue but, alas, scentwise they are only in the same theme. The comparison is not the same as, say, Acqua di Gio with 360 Red, which can pass for each other.

On it's own it is a good cologne but I'm glad I only got the 100ml and not the 200ml. Now, the hunt is still on for a great deal on Polo Blue.

Will acquire again only on a good deal since longevity and projection are sorely lacking.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I don't get any cucumbers in the opening, or ever, as listed in the notes above. I get a kind of generic aquatic/greens blast for a good half an hour until it starts to dry down. Completely different from the original Eternity IMHO.

When it starts drying down I start smelling the lotus, lavender, roses (which isn't in the listed notes so it might just be my nose) and patchouli, would have never noticed the plum if I hadn't read the note breakdown but now that I see it I can smell hints of it. Then after about 4 hours, the floral notes give way to more patchouli, woodsy notes and musk at which time it smells almost identical to POLO BLUE. At this point I feel like it's a skin scent, but then when I walk by co-workers they are apparently left smelling the wake of it.

Even though its smells is reminiscent of like 100 different colognes and there's nothing really unique or special about it, the girls at my work seem to like how it smells on me. They like it waaay more than I do. And since it doesn't give me a headache I don't mind wearing it from time to time just to keep it fresh at work.

Longevity: 7/10
Sillage: 7/10
Originality: 3/10

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Pleasantly fresh and common. Everyone will enjoy this juice. Lasts for around 1 hour. Not worth the price.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
A really nice fresh, clean aqua that I actually like better than Eternity itself. Very nice and clean reminiscent of a classic soapy note with no soapy feel at all.

Almost third on my buy list, but I'd have to compare it to my existing summer scents.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Oh my, this scent is good. Nice aquatic, slightly spicy woody. It's not too much of either, it's not over the top in any way. This is my fiancé´s signature scent, and it's so very addictive to me. He always smells so good. I have smelt this on a few other guys and I think it's easy to pull of och suits many. It's a beauty, go get it!

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: A nice soft and light fresh aqua scent. It has a hint of salty smell and reminds me a little of that clean scent from original yellow dial bars of soap.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Very underrated fragrance.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Something about the Eternity frags that always has a nasty 'green' chemical dry-down to it. As far as aquatic scents go, its not bad, and does moderately in terms of projection and longevity. Its unoffensive and wearable anywhere - its just not stand-out. Then again, its not expensive. In that respect, you get what you pay for, but like I said, the dry-down leaves little to be desired.

Have a great day!

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Believe me! "Ill bet my name on this"

Nickomay30

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Since i have a fairly big collection, i purchased Eternity Aqua just for collection purpose, i had no expectations. After trying it i started to like it more and more, i even liked it more than the original (which i like for its nostalgic value), even though i didn't use it that much, the higher brands like Chanel and Cartier always took an advantage over it.
Recently i decided to give it a chance and use it before the summer ends, so i started wearing it to the office...it was a big surprise, i got tons of compliments, some of them were huge ones and came from unexpected people, women love it way more than expected (one asked me for a spray on her hand to keep sniffing it).
I don't actually wear nor pick my fragrances to get complements or for attraction, i wear what i do enjoy and what gives me the vibe that matches my mood, but to be honest, it's always a good refreshing thing to get a nice complement, now while I'm enjoying the uplifting refreshing almost salty feeling combined with the confidence that I'm smelling nice for people around me.
What a nice surprise from a brand that i usually tend to not appreciate that much.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I don’t claim to know much about perfumes but I know what I like. I like winter- the harsher and more brutal the winter the happier I get. Think frozen lakes, snow storms, gnashing winds and grey clouds. The movie Tron Legacy and Snow Falling on Cedars – best epitomises the scent best associated to these bleak dramas.

Think of rain, ferocious waves and fog. That foreboding image have a scent to it- a sharp, clean icy scent. If I can add a twist to the scent- snow laced with blood and semen.

So on with the review. Calvin Klein Aqua ruined my winter visage.Finally I finally came to understand that not all aquatics perfume are suitable to evoke wintry visage. This is surely the case with CK-Aqua.

The top note is very brief, just three seconds of iciness before the sharp spicy woodiness takes over. The sharp spicy scent lasts a long time. I sprayed some my clothes and instead of reminding me of warmth associated with foggy New Hampshire mornings, I am thrown hurly burly into the Madrid summer night scene! It took seven hours before the spicy woodiness to abate to let the oceanic scent return (just meekly!).

This is quite an inverted scent. What took front stage is the base note. Once again the spiciness turns me off, gosh it hollers- look I am sophisticated!. The heart note once again made of spicy note – is very unforgiving. Finally, many, many,many hours later, the top notes meekly announces itself- apple, citrus and cucumber. 90% base note. 9% heart note and 1% top note.

By then I am so sick of being reminded of summer that I look forward to a long shower to wash off that scent. If you love summer parties of Ibiza or Tel Aviv- seen and be see crowd this is a great scent but not suitable for the serious winter person who prefer the bleak isolation of Iceland.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I Love this one, better than Azzaro chrome for me. this frag has a soft and fresh aroma. I have no sweat salty feeling in hot outdoor like when I wear chrome.
love it !

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
It's fresh ,soft but not too soft..it opens with fruity aquatic, sweet but in fresh way, after 30 minute you will understand why it's called aqua,so fresh and relaxing..longevity max 5 Hours in me

8/10

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Smells great. Girlfriend loves it. Doesn't last toó long but it's a light scent so that's to be expected.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I tested it before making my decision, but I found it the faintest aquatic perfume I've ever smelled. It's nice though, and likeable.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: This is a new make of the aquatics like Polo sport, with the plum, and the new type of typical cedar woods drydown. It is a calone bomb. Your standard aquatic.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Just realized that this is a watered down version of one of my favorite scents of all time-PoloSport by Ralph Lauren. Aqua becomes faint after an hour, though pple close to you can smell it. I dont think I'll get a second bottle. Not worth spending more than 35 US bucks.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Eternity’s Aqua should not be overlooked – a gem and underrated as a Spring/Summer aquatic fragrance. This one has been on the shelf for a while and I was pleasantly surprised today – the blend of aromatic, aquatic, citrus, and woodsy notes is quite pleasing. I had the “clean” and “fresh” type feeling all day – similar to the feeling when you wake after a storm has passed through the night and you see the sun rising in the early morning hours over the ocean. Clean and renewed – today is going to be a good day..!! There is a remarkable similarity to Polo Blue – I think Blue may have a bit more “umphh” in projection, though. Aqua is sufficiently flexible for any event, generally a crowd pleaser, and modestly priced, adding to the appeal. If there is any criticism of Aqua, it will be in performance – I smell it most of the day, lasting solidly 4+ hours (longer on clothing), but very close to skin level. I am a huge fan of the aquatic fragrances and endorse adding Eternity’s Aqua to your collection. Given the pricing, definitely a must for the younger, novice, or amateur collector. Final tally for Aqua is 4.0 stars out of 5.0 stars and a solid "like" for all the "Fragrantica Following". Enjoy your day…

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Yesterday was the first day of spring, so I put on Eternity Aqua for Men. It was perfect. I enjoy this fragrance greatly. I even spray it on my pillows at night. I am surprised more women have not discovered what a pleasure this is to wear.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: A flanker that is worthy. I wont say that it's great but I do like it. Fans of Polo Blue should like it as well. Instead of melon EA uses citruses and the cucumber is a bit lighter here than in Polo Blue. Performance is moderate which is typical but it makes a great warm weather/office scent. I cant see many folks hating this.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
tried some samples. not amazing, not too bad. it's a spring/summer fragrance,i smell something synthetic in the scent. the sillage is so strong that a friend told me "oh please, are u wearing an american fragrance? i hate it"

my vote 6,5/10

non strabiliante ma neanche una schifezza. è un profumo da stagioni calde, personalmente ho percepito un qualcosa di sintetico nella fragranza, pungeva all'olfatto. ho usato dei campioncini, una volta mi incontrai con un amico che disse "oh per favore, hai messo un cavolo di profumo americano no?" la proiezione è molto forte per essere una eau de toilette estiva, non esagerare con gli spray.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Eternity Aqua is one of the nicest smelling Aquatic scent, if not the best. But just for the SMELL, It is without question THE MOST AMAZING & PLEASANT SMELL FOR ME, I use this scent sometime before I go to bed So I can go to sleep with a smile and pleasant thought. But I was going to choose one aquatic for my shelf and current use, and with regret I had to choose Bvlgari Aqva, and the reason is Eternity on my skin does not project after 3/4 hours, when Bvlgari Aqva still going strong as a skin scent. but for the quality of smell, Eternity Aqua is second to none. So Eternity Aqua gets this SPECIAL LOVE from me. It might fade away quick, but when it lives, it smells AMAZING, Scent wise NOT OTHER AQUATIC I FOUND AS PERFECT, FLAWLESS AS THIS. This is just DEVINE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! YES THIS IS A SMELL TO LOVE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! But I am unfortunate it does not last on my skin, but it does last on some peoples skin for very long time. Wish I was one of them, and in the case Eternity Aqua would kick my current and only Aquatic Bvlgari Aqva's butt big time. It is easy to wear, deeply masculine and sexy as a hell. This is only smell I cant stop sniffing. I have some juice left and I am sure as soon as it finishes I will have to replace with a small bottle to wear when I want to smell good and enjoy myself then to think of pleasing others. I am quite sure It will please others too as long as it lived on your skin. I will give it a shot in hot summer days and it Might make the list. as My list of top 15 is all gems I found in my life so far with trial and error with 100s of fragrance, and I FEEL HONOURED TO ADMIT, **ETERNITY AQUA** GOT SPECIAL LOVE AMONG ALL FOR THE SMELL. I have to repeat its AMAZING!!!!!!!!!! and when I say SPECIAL, I MEAN IT! So give it a try and see it migth work wonder for you.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I like the smell of this. It's slightly sweet, fresh, and crisp. I do notice the "cucumber" note which adds to the refreshing part of this fragrance. I'm not sure how this compares with "Eternity" but I think this one smells better. As far as I can tell by comparing a few other aqua version fragrances, I think I like some other ones better then this one. This one was nice enough to try out and I recommend to try it out, if you like "aqua" version fragrances or just trying to find something different to wear during the hot months of the year.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
I am always amused that a fragrance called "Eternity" does not last for eternity!

At first, it smells pretty much like a lot of other aquatics, but persevere with this as the drydown is a sweet steamy warmth with a floral element - not at all harsh.

Unusually for Calvin Klein fragrances it has got pretty good longevity. It lasts most of the day on my skin with moderate sileage, therefore giving decent value for money.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: very refreshing

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Although I'm not a great fan of Calvin Klein perfumes, this one is an exception.
It is very great perfume. wow
And for a aquatic it behaves very stylish and not as prominent like other aquatics.
But you won't find any aquatic notes. That is what makes this perfume so special. the notes are very fresh, cucumber, green and citric notes. In the middle the lotus with its typical flowery-soapy like scent opens.
This note is underlined with plum, pepper and lavender. a really great combination that gives that flowery-aromatic scent and that stays to the end.
Sandalwood, patouchili and musk give the finishing touch.
It has a great silage and longevity.yes y can wear it in all occasions.
This is a nice perfume.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Very pleased and impressed by this one. Perfectly likeable which is saying plenty for a fragrance in this genre, which has some real turds in it.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: This is not a bad fragrance as such but to my nose it is catastrophically vulgar. I 'get it' but I can't stand it.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: it is relay refreshing ozonic perfume but it is like other CK perfumes fade away fast but not faster than CKfree which dose not last more than half a hour in spite of its nice perfume.these perfume i don recommend for more than two hours time so you need to hold the perfume bottle in your pocket and have a spray every hour.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: A wonderful summer scent for during the day.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: The cucumber and lotus here make odd bedfellows and don't really mesh, this comes off a bit too green and synthetic towards the middle and has a high synthetic core to it that undoes all the great things going for this fragrance in regards to excellent performance, longevity, sillage and affordability. The top is great at first, a heavy dose of citrus and cucumber in the vein of Polo Blue but with more power and strength behind it thanks to the heavy dose of synthetic green and aromatic elements. The problem is that the lotus and green synthetics don't mesh well with the cucumber and plum, creating a dissonance that is cloying and abrasive around the 30 minute mark. Projection is mammoth for an aromatic aquatic, easily heavy for most of the way through and longevity is outstanding at over 8 hours consistently after having worn it over the last week, but unfortunately the scent just doesn't blend well and its synthetic core really shows itself quickly and this one never really evolves beyond the top and mid, making for a very linear wear and one that alienates quickly. Amazing performance, best kept for every once in awhile as this is simply too cloying and synthetic for your sinuses for daily wear.

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Awesome every day use, summer fragrance. Its like a nice aquatic with an awesome woody back ground. Maybe the sandalwood but the dry down is sweet and nice. Girls and my girlfriend love this fragrance! 6 hour longevity and moderate projection and ok silliage. So all around this is a a good, everyday cologne for highschools or the younger crowd

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: Good for daily usage. Fresh and you know this scents similar to each other. When benchmarking U dont expectation such scents to legendary. Because you know its all blue:)

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
Update,
What I failed to mention about this fragrance is that it's perfect for daytime casual wear not meant for a sophisticated evening where your wanting to impress someone special. Ck has lighter and fresh notes not a heavier deep aroma like CK Euphoria. After reading the reviews that this frag smells like Polo Blue..I tried out myself and YA big time very similar.

Ck Eternity Aqua has a very aquatic scent mixed with both a light floral/woodsy notes. After it dries dowm I'm able to smell lavender and plum combined with cedar and patchouli which gives this frag a real aromatic aroma.
A lot would appreciate the appealing qualities that comes from this frag which is enjoyable during the spring and summer months without it being offensive to anyone. The frag takes on slightly powdery sweet scent which is from musk giving it a really appealing fragrance.
Longevity and Silage are both very good...
Overall though,
I know that a lot of people consider this collections for a much longer age group. I would agree that CK is trying to go after the age group that's from 20-30yrs old which wants a freshness and aromatic scent which this one has. Thou I'm not in that age group I'm still able to enjoy this fragrance just like a lot are able to.
Overall rating....6.5/10 ★★★

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content:
This is a really well formulated aquatic fragrance surprisingly without sea or water accords. I could smell citruses right after I unboxed it, a bit harsh in my opinion. Not sure why but I don't smell cucumber at all, I can't say there isn't, but I guess gets mixed up with the plum. Try Abercrombie & Fitch Cologne 41 which opens up to a predominantly cucumber burst (it's almost like I rub a freshly cut cucumber on my skin and then smelling off it)
What I do sense is cool green notes that evolves after the opening fades away (ten minutes?), followed by hints of lavender and musk.

Reminds me of Bvlgari Aqva + Davidoff Cool Water + a spicy fragrance, all rolled into one.
I can't agree more, it smells just like RL Polo Blue, not the opening so much because Polo Blue opens with Melon (but dissipates quickly) and CK Eternity Aqua opens with citruses and plum.

It was a blind buy based on reviews here and I don't regret it.
It suits best for a lunch date, preferably at an open air restaurant facing a sea or a lush green lawn.


Sillage: 7
Longevity: 6, better on skin than on clothes.
Fragrance: 8

product_name: Eternity Aqua for Men Calvin Klein
review_content: I do not believe this is a MUST have as some say...neither a blind buy..I just sample this 30 minutes ago and from the first moment you feel something cheap smelling, rude, sharp...etc..., I do not care if it evolves over time, maybe not even that...I just cannot stand this first minutes or hour....at the same price tag you can find much more quality fragrances, e.g: mont blanc individuel, he wood, rocky mountain good, versace eau fraice, versace pour homme, ence noir, lalique white, versace the dramer and even cheaper...lanvin l 'homme, lanvin l'homme sport...just to cite a few..each of this is 1 or 2 classes above
To the person below me: the bottle is gorgeous. Much prettier than picture. Fragrance is very nice. I love the mahogany note. It's a different spin on the original. I do love it!

Once I have read it will be ornamented with Swarowski crystals Im sure I wont buy it. Sorry, times when the name Swarovsky was prestigeous are long over due to the company dubious politics, and now you can find their crystals on everything except toilet paper perhaps, stuff including mineral water bottles and nail files. So although I am a huge fan of Euphoria I dont think I will get it.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content: I’ve had her sitting for years and pulled her out to confirm it hadn’t gone bad and nope. Euphoria edt still fresh/floral and vibrant after years of no use. Still smells pretty but not much complexity. Still a little sexy though.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content:
This is my all time favorite fragrance and is very nostalgic for me. I’ve never found anything that smells quite like this. The new version does not compare. I’ve been looking everywhere for a bottle that is still good, the ones I tried from ebay had oxidized and spoiled. If anyone is selling a still fresh bottle, please let me
know!

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content: it's like euphoria EDP but daytime friendly, makes me perk up when i spritz it

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content: @elsee - Calvin Klein just released a new Euphoria EDT 2023, you must have purchased the 2023 release. Check the database on here and compare your box/bottle.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content:
Ugh. I ordered this because I USED TO LOVE the original EDT version a few years back. I ran out some time ago and couldn't find this anywhere. Well, I found it last week and all I can say is either my nose has changed or this reformulation is horrible. It's strong and has no resemblence to the EDP. I'll stick with my original EDP and move on. Wish I had not spent the money. :(

Honestly, most of my reviews are positive but every once in a while, there is a disappointment.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content: To me, on my skin, Euphoria edt is exactly like the edp but office friendly. It lasts 8+ hours and the projection is suitable for office environment, noticable but pleasant. Nice floral oriental fragrance that's an enormous compliment getter from both man and women.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content:
It was hard to describe this smell, but I just ended with.....
Smells like EUPHORIA
"a feeling or state of intense excitement and happiness"
[ Example - the EUPHORIA of success will fuel your desire to continue training]

It doesn't smell like "happiness" it's smells as the description sentence,
the in between hope [of achieving something that will bring happiness] and reaching it.

It starts airy [hopeful] fresh, then there's some strange note in the middle and then ends in a linear softness but not musk or vanilla, but like air that ends, like a breeze soft feeling

Would I wear it? No
I am not walking "euphoria" .... it's not a happy fragrance, it's not bad,
its unique but not sexy or femenine, it kind leaves you scratching your head, do I or not like it?
It definitely has personality. That I like.

Would I buy it? YES
for aromatheraphy, for the artistic smell behind it, for inspiration or perhaps wear it in a very particular occassion.

It's not a fragrance that identifies me as a person so it's not my cup of tea for wearing
but I did enjoy the abstraction and that it does have "personality"
and one that matches the name given.

Rate for artistic creation
10/10

Rate for wearing [personal]
4/10

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content: CLASSIFIES AS A SEXY MUSK. My sister gave me this scent a few years back for Christmas but I dismissed it and put it away. Today, I took it out as she gave me another beautiful scent as a gift. As I sample this again I’m surprised at how good it is similar to Louis Vuitton Atrape- Reves at a more affordable price tag.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content:
This could easily have been one of my lower end top favourites - IF, only it could have lasted longer and better constructed. Sadly it fades off too quickly. But its beautiful..and i dont link it with the original. For me, two separate scents.

It almost covers all bases required, a high sweet not heavy nor sickly, a bit citrus and uplifting. Only a touch woody with some green - maybe transparent.

It almost is like a crystal clear, light hearted version of moschino by moschino sans the heavier orientalism - thats not a negative for moschino, moschino is truly wonderful (and not necessarily heavy).
Euphoria edt is also a tiny bit like Angel edt , and there so - what i would have liked angel edt to be. Now with all the above, i hope you have a clearer picture of Euphoria edt.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content:
To me the shape of this bottle recalls those suspended (maybe the word is hanging, sorry for my bad english) fireplaces. So beautiful!
The first time I sniffed Euphoria EdT on a strip test, the scent blew me away. Once back home, I was surprised to think about it and wish to smell it again, especially for that cleverly mixed honeysuckle note. Praiseworthy.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content:
This is quite nice for a Calvin Klein fragrance. I actively dislike Obsession but Euphoria is very different. More floral, a bit soapy mixed with initial sweetness, Euphoria starts big and dries down quickly and nicely. A little goes a long way with this scent.
Euphoria is a good, modern fragrance. It's inexpensive and wearable, an every day perfume.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content: In my experience this is still very similar to Euphoria, but watered down about halfway with more wood. But this is all good! Makes for a more wearable version in the warmer months.

product_name: Euphoria Eau de Toilette Calvin Klein
review_content:
This is what I would call a crowd pleaser.It is a fruity sweet and light fragrance not very long lasting and kind of fizzy, bubbly. Made me think of champagne when spraying it on and it did not last not even a hour on my skin, always wondered why and never got interested in knowing up until i checked it out and it was eau de toilette and found this to be the reason.
Apart from that it is fruity sweet and nice smelling more like a deo spray but with a nice quite good quality vibe and sophistication as well thought it smelled a little grapey.
I haven't smelt the Edp but i think that one would be better that this, would last longer and maybe would have a better smell, less diluted.
