review_content: The opening of this reminds me quite a bit of Pink Sugar (just not quite as sweet), with amber and chocolate coming out as this dries down. It reminds me of a body spray you'd get from Victoria's Secret. I like it, but definitely not a must-have.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
a good casual scent for daytime or summer! ☀️

this is my very first perfume, gifted by my dad. i really like the opening -- the berries and chocolates are delicately blended. however, after a while, the spicy notes take over (probably patchouli or passion flower) and makes it very synthetic and offensive.

➤ lasts 1-2 hours
➤ weak projection, skin scent
➤ 6/10 - clean bottle design but hate the exposed cap

i rarely reach for it in comparison to my other perfumes but keeping this for nostalgia. 💭

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Different from the others in the CK One line, no citrus here. Musky blackberry scent, extra fruitiness from passionflower, some sweetness from Mexican chocolate. It does smell like Mexican chocolate, a little tart and spicy, not full decadent gourmand chocolate. CK One Shock is heavier than the other CK Ones', but it's still light enough to spray liberally in summer. I actually splash it on because the bottle has a twist off top. It lasts pretty well on me, for an EDT. It is similar to other sweet musky berry scents that I have tried.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: It's lightly sweet, spicy and inoffensive. It didn't last very long on my skin and was mostly used as a night out fragrance. I'd arrive at the venue smelling of CK Shock and go home smelling of everyone's cigarette smoke so that's how long it lasted and that's the fragrance memory it conjures up.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: This was very underwhelming. The weakest scent i own, can barley smell it at all. Its a slight skin scent at best!! :( Not impressed with it at all.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
A nice, casual fresh/sweet fragrance, different due to the dark chocolate.
Opens with passionflower, tart berry and citrus, joined by vanilla, soft musk and lighter florals/discreet patchouli. The dark chocolate adds depth and a bitter touch.
The first hours 3-4 the berry, passionflower and chocolate are more pronounced, After that a pleasant, softer skin scent of soft musk, vanilla and florals remain.
Fortunately I don't get any "Axe" from this :).

An uplifting, inoffensive fragrance, great for intimate settings or work/leisure. I don't find it cheap, too sweet or juvenile. It's a bit joyous, flirty and sporty and could suit anyone young at heart, regardless age (gifted myself one💃🌸). Will enjoy this now when the long, cold winter is finally over.

Moderate sillage but strong longevity on me as a skin scent, I can still feel it after 8 hours. Lasts on clothes for a few days.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I can't help it, I love this. Something about it is so unique to me. Yes - the sillage and longevity are poor. It lasts better than a body spray but not by much. But the scent of this is SO addictive to me. The chocolate and passion flower keep me constantly smelling my wrist.

I agree with others that it's a good bedtime scent. It's so cozy. It's not overly sweet. It's youthful and girly, but in a way I've not smelled before - it has an elegance I can't place.

It's tough to put in a category because it's... just not a pure floral, fruity or gourmand scent to me. It is its own thing!! Because it's not heavy or cloying I would wear this any season.

This was discovered by smelling it on a stranger, a "what IS that?" moment. At the low price you can get this for, in a HUGE 200ml bottle at that - I'm very happy.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I'm not sure why people are saying it doesn't last - I'm on six hours now, and it's still very much there.
Now, sillage, that's a problem. It's a "you have to hug me to smell it"-scent.
Some people like that.
I am not one of them.
The scent itself is fresh and sweet, but not sugary, or even cloying - it's a fresh sort of sweetness.
Sadly, the past half-hour, I've noticed something that reads as vaguely "axe spray"-drydown, to me. Too bad - I liked it, aside from that.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
My poor working nose detects a sweet, fruity, pink flowery, creamy chocolaty and powdery scent.

At first I had the ck one SHOCK for her in the shock absorber travel spray vaporisateur nomade with 20 ml of this lovely juice. At that time I found the white rectangular plastic vaporizer with hot pink soft rubbery case and hot pink SHOCK on the front very modern and practical.
Now our phones are mostly rectangular with a protective rubbery case. The design was truly an inspiration.

Today I have bought the 200 ml bottle. A bit disappointed with its normalcy.

I like this scent because it starts fresh but not sour. I was surprised there is no citrus in this scent or green notes. So this freshness must be the alcohol with Red Poppy and Narcissus?
I smell sweet pink flowers; perhaps Passion Flower, Jasmine and Peony? I think sweet fruitiness is from a jammy Blackberry. And powder is from the Mexican chocolate and Musk. I have never had Mexican chocolate, so I have no idea.
There is Vanille and Patchouli for sure, and the Amber adds that nice deep warmth to it. And a bit of spice, maybe? There is a development but it’s all close together.

I really like this! I think oriental isn’t a bad description for this eau de toilette. It isn’t light, it’s sweet, fruity and warm. I hope that, with age, my new bottle losses the alcoholic start a bit and becomes even smoother. Happy with my purchase.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: One of the worst things I have smelled in quite some time. Liquid candy . . . but the kind of candy that is so bad, you didn't even want it when you were a little kid and your pediatrician was handing it out for free. The kind that is corn syrup and some sort of cancer-causing florescent dye, and nothing else really. So sweet, it will make La Vie Est Belle or straight ethyl maltol smell sophisticated. The kind of person who would like this would get several extra pumps of syrup in their Starbie pink drink, and would sugar-up their cough syrup. Gag-inducing, for anyone who actually had a palate (and a nose).

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Hahaha the longevity and sillage on this one is A JOKE!!
A bodymist from the dailystore holds longer than this!!!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I found this scent while researching fragrances with a slight chocolate or white chocolate note. I love the faint chocolatey notes in Vera Wang Princess, Jessica Simpson Signature, and Britney Spears Fantasy.

With CK One Shock I get no chocolate or vanilla on me, this is definitely the lightest scent I’ve ever used, all I get is a super faint fresh green scent. If you are like me and interested in this scent because of the chocolate or vanilla note, skip it! It really is just the faintest fresh laundry scent. Big disappointment unfortunately!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: On me this smells like a really sweet play dough. I like it but I don't wear it so much because I have so many fragrances. I'm still happy I have it though and u love the bottle and sprayer.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
At first this smells so much like Ariana Moonlight to me, but slightly less sharp and a whisper of chocolate. I like it, I think it's pretty, but I'll probably sell because the longevity is as poor as everyone says. And I was hoping for more gourmandy goodness; I don't get any vanilla with this and I can *barely* detect chocolate if I look for it.

Got a 100ml bottle at Ross for $20 so I can't be mad.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I like it to go to sleep, it’s like being a passion flower fruity chocolate, but transparent and fresh enough for a lovely shared night.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: In 2018 while on a holiday in greece my mom decided to buy a calvin klein body wash because both of us remember events by the scents. It turns out that the trip to greece now means a lot to me because i got into reading then and it changed my life. This scent reminds me of summer in a foreign country and my favorite book, what was it like to read for the first time.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Blind bought this in a set that came with the male version that i plan to give my brother for christmas, why not get a gift while giving a gift!

This fragrance is such a pleasant unique surprise, i wasn’t expecting it. Theres also this familiarity to it, like I’ve definitely smelt this on people in the past; im almost certain one of my teachers wore this.

Im a big fan of passion flower, which is what prompted this purchase so much, but its not really at the forefront at all, more hanging out in the background. I feel like i should have tried this years ago, i would have been wearing religiously. Its clean and fresh but still flirtatious, sometimes its very reminiscent of Ari by Ariana Grande.

Only issue i found, which has been stated quite a few times here, is the longevity is relatively poor and it overall sits pretty close to the skin. Within 2 hours the fragrance is for the most part evaporated, but i like that for fragrances i use after a shower.

Id give this a solid 8/10 and totally recommend giving it a try, especially when 6.7oz bottles can be had on ebay for under $30. At the very least sample it, you may find a new favorite daily like I did!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: funny story on my first encounter with this scent; back in high school the girl who owned this sat behind me and she broke her bottle in the middle of class and it didn't take long for the whole classroom to smell of this fragrance. its fresh floral, citrusy, musky with a hint of spiciness. i love the patchouli in this. although i don't really smell the chocolate... maybe its just me. this reminds me of preppy high school girls

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Where has this been all my life? The scent itself is the cat's pajamas! It's simple, yet complicated, very nuanced. Smooth and elegantly done for the type of fragrance it is; sweet/youthful/casual.

However......I'm having the same issue as many others. It's way too faint. I have to severely over spray if I want to smell this for an hour without searching for it.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Something isn’t right here… I’ve had this fragrance longer than any other, it says it was released 2011 but the one prior was 1994, but I’m sure I’ve had this for 15-20 years… and to add to that mine smells straight up fresh citrus which is what the older formula was. It’s very confusing…I’m wanting to use it up so it’s a out-of-the-shower, wake-me-up fragrance at this time, what’s really crazy is it’s super fresh and citrus notes don’t typically last. It’s a real 🤔 to me!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: My stepmom gave me her bottle when I was about 20-21 and I loved it!! It smells so sweet and playful and young. Kind of sporty too. I wore this everyday while I was in cosmetology school and it reminds me of that time in my life. It’s very nostalgic for me. I haven’t worn this in years but I sniff it from time to time and it still has a special place in my heart ❤️

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: On my skin this smells identical to playdough 🤣 I was checking these reviews to see if I'm the only one and apparently I am. I'm surprised how weak this is I over spray and this didn't even last 30 mins I think that's the shocking part lol. I usually don't care about the longevity because I'm gonna over spray any way but this is bad after one hour I can't even smell it at all.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: My signature scent like 7-8 years ago. Very girly and sweet. Not my cup of tea anymore as I really steer away from anything sweet with patchouli. Anyone can wear a perfume, but I’d say this suits women 15-30, because in my opinion it’s quite young. I’d wear it any season if it wasn’t too hot outside.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I made a mistake of buying 200 ml bottle few years ago and now i m trying to finish it up, I got sick of it. Now i start to spray it on clothes only just to finish it quick. I like it back then, the first few hours has a good sillage and good projection on me, after stays close to the skin. It is very childish scent, for a young lady who start wearing frangrances like her mother, who wants to be treated like a grown up. Perfect for any season and for any occasion

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: When I want to smell "pink" this is what I wear.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I liked this for about one summer then I was like mhhhhhhh, I’m changing to something else. Its not terrible, Fruity Floral but I’m not returning again.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I usually don’t listen to comments or reviews so when they said this has weak staying power I still bought a bottle because who knows it might actually last long on my skin. But lo and behold, the longevity is so poor that some of my BBW/Victoria Secret mists lasts even longer than this. Sometimes not even 30 mins and I could hardly smell it. Ugh!

The thing is I super love how this smells like so I still consider this a win blind buy. I’ll just have to keep reapplying since it’s totally inexpensive. How i wish they make an intense version of this. To my nose it smells like a chocolatey-berry sweet that is so pleasant. The smell makes up for the lack of power but I really really wish it lasts longer…oh well!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I'm so disappointed by this scent. I've tested it a few times in the past but recently bought a bottle on a whim and while it was pretty cheap (and so I don't mind liberally spraying it) it is just really underwhelming. Generic sweet with no real discernible notes. I can sometimes get a hint of the mexican chocolate but barely and at a certain point it smells a bit like a weak air freshener. Barely lasts fifteen minutes and only if I touch my nose to my skin.

Despite all that criticism I will inevitably use the whole bottle pretty fast because it isn't unpleasant and works as a "may as well use it up" kinda scent as long as you don't expect to smell of anything within half an hour.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Soft sweet berry chocolate scent. This doesn't project and sits close. But, anytime I wear this I seem to get a headache. I have other fruity scents, but never get a headache from those.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: The ofalctory equivalent of passing outside a middle school yard during recess. Noise, noise, noise, each note trying to yell above the others but in the end they all get lost in each other in a loud cacophonous mess. Would smell like a bad supermarket perfume, if supermarket perfumes disappeared from your skin in a couple of hours...and I'm not complaining about that.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
At first I didn't like this one. It was too sweet for me. Not vanilla sweet...more like not so fresh fruit sweet. After a few months it was time for a second chance. New season, new me...
Now I like it (not very much but enough to sometimes spice my day a little bit). It's still sweet in a very strange way but now I can smell other notes I didn't smell before.
It's very intimate but very long lasting. I can smell it after 10+ hours (less but it is still there).
And it's not safe blind buy at all. Try it!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: This perfume has a nice sweet scent however it doesn’t last more than 1 hour

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Very sweet generic and cheap smelling

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Skin test, blustery summer day

I had this along time ago, tested it again.

Today I get great top notes, a nice middle and we'll see what the end brings.
Its warm on a rounded way, not a fruity scent which jm glad, has an icing sugar feel like on the outside of marshmallow, I did get that enveloping a floral fresh rounded heart, quite simple and easy.
Lasting we'll so far, and pretty good value.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Smells exactly like sugarcoated cut unripe mangoes. Not something I would want to wear or smell on anyone whatsoever. Too sweet and nauseating for my liking.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: This was just a glop of vanilla overkill. I'm so sorry report. Just get a La Vie Est Belle or something instead.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: It opens fruity-sweet, much sweeter than I‘d generally expect from CK, (which is probably why it‘s not marketed as a unisex scent), but quite pleasant. I can‘t detect any chocolate. It dries into a skin scent quickly on me without much change.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Just bought this, the notes sounded delicious! It does smell like warm chocolate which is what attracted me to it. Sillage and longevity is poor, even after multiple sprays. It became a skin scent very quickly on me, under 5 minutes! But I like it so much, I don’t care if only I can smell it.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: A perfume that manages to stay light and fresh despite having chocolate, vanilla and patchouli. It’s like a watered down version of a gourmand. Not bad actually. Unpretentious, sugar and spice and everything nice. Fleeting, but for the price tag you cand keep on spritzing.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I used to wear this perfume, which is very fresh, friendly and nice. It doesn t last so much but it worths for the price. It s not somebody that doesn t like sweet frangrances.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Ah another perfume of wasted potential. Passion flower is one of the best florals to pair with gourmand Vanilla. The balance is great. It's not too sweet, not too musky, not too fruity. It's not just a one-dimension kind of fragrance. It has its own phases and depth without being too heavy. I can see teens and adults wearing this in any occasion with ease. Gyms? Sure. Work? Great. Party? Why not. I guess they made this to fit any kind of season and occasion. A mass market item. Sadly, this is rather weak and comparable to body sprays. It's cheap though! Safe for blind buy and gifts.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
The fragrance I wore before I really got into fragrance.
Generic, inoffensive fruity floral. More fruity than floral, really. Doesn't last long at all - probably best used as a body spray rather than a perfume. I used to wear it every day because it was simple and sweet and no one was going to really hate smelling it on me. But it's nothing special. Nowadays I just use it on clothes to freshen them up.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Yum! The chocolate, citrus, and sweetness create a delicious casual scent. It doesn't last too long, but I wouldn't expect anything less of a cheap perfume like this. A great addition to my collection.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I recently bought this from someone, on Mercari, thinking it sounded good and that I'd like it. Blah. It's so light, you can hardly smell it. And forget any kind of longevity, because it's non-existent. Boring. Next. LOL

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Yes, this perfume does fade fast but I still get a few hours of goodess from this beauty! I get the mostly vague oriental fruits from this, in the best way, it is a burst of fun and nothing serious at all (obvious from the bottle) but I do see this as unique. I enjoy spritzing this when I want something easy and fun that isn't going to stick around all day. I would recommend this, don't expect anything ground breaking but do expect to feel uplifted and young :)

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
First of all it lasts about 5 min.
The worst longevity I have ever had.
Zero sillage,you can spray hundred times,but it last 5 minutes ;DD just don’t recommend that for anybody

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: A decent but generic floral fruity with poor longevity. A nice daytime summery scent but far too average.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: The few first times I wear this, I didn't like it very much, it was "meh" and the sillage and the longevity was also very weak, also all I smelled was alcohol. All of those made it sit on the shelf for quite a long time, maybe 5-6 months. Until today, I decided to give it a try again. I must say first, I have and I have used a lot, I mean a lot fragrances including desginer's and niche, yet this time, I kinda love this one. This time, it didn't smell like alcohol at all (maybe because I give the bottle a little shake before use, a tip I've learned recently). You can definitely get the strawberry note (which I don't see in the note description), very very lovely, sweet but not too sweet, cute and young, a little bit something like powdery which I really enjoy. I don't see any floral notes personally. The sillage as well as the longevity this time was a hit for CK line. You can know that I'm in the room for about 30-60m, but after that it lingers and a few hours later, you have to sniff your wrist in order to notice it, which was quite good for a CK. The price is very cheap so can't complain. I must say I really enjoy it this time. I recommend you guys give this one a shot.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
This has been one of my favourite perfumes for years, I wouldn't say that I have a signature scent, but this is probably the closest I have to a signature. Having said that I understand that people find this a generic fruity-sweet scent, but on me it is quite special. It may also be my happy memories of this and a certain amount of nostalgia (I have loved this for almost 10 years and worn it continuously for over 9), but it really does work on me. I also get moderate sillage with this (I find it fair for an EDT) and moderate longevity on skin and excellent longevity on clothing. My skin is usually a fragrance leech and I find even big perfumes have average to poor longevity on me, which is why I find it strange that this lasts relatively well on me compared to most people.
For me this starts with the blackberry and passion flower and quickly segues into the chocolate with the vanilla and musk bringing up the powdery base. Like the other Calvin Klein scent I know and love, it is well balanced and blended.
I remember eagerly racing around duty free for the very first time in late 2011, excited to be in the international part of the airport and travelling and sniffing endless bottles of perfume, low, middle and high end. By the end of the trip I had fallen in love with 3 fragrances, CK One Shock Her (the advertising around this was ubiquitous at the time), Prada Candy (same, the advertising was everywhere) and CK In2U. In early 2012, I had a bit of remaining spending money in hand, it was not enough to get Prada Candy but was enough for CK One Shock or CK In2U and I had to decide. At the time this was at the tail end of my fruity-citrus phase and the citrusy but unique In2U was the natural choice, however the sweetness of One Shock Her drew me in and I walked out with this in my suitcase. This was the first of many bottles of CK One Shock Her and the beginning of my love of gourmand fragrances and I still love it today.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Fruity, fresh, sweet, with an almost candy floss undertone. It is nice but not special - good value for money though.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Fruity, sweet, inoffensive. The drydown smells almost exactly like Britney Spears VIP Private Show. Since I love that, I also love this.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: i only get fruity notes, none of the chocolate or depth. i've noticed that this lasts wayyyy longer on clothes, but still only lasts me a good 2.5-3 hours. to give credit where credit is due, it is very refreshing and totally suitable for summer, and though i enjoy the scent i dont see myself reaching for this since i have other summer perfumes i love more. very pretty, but all in all boring and lacking in uniqueness.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: great scent poor lasting.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I don't know why but I get compliments every time I use this perfume. People smell this on me though sometimes I can't smell it anymore. One time I was out with my friends and one of them commented how good I smell, and it even overpowered the cigarette I was smoking. I think this one reacts to my body chemistry really well which is good considering this is a very affordable perfume. I love it!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Oh heavens no. This is non-existent on my skin n clothing within 5 minutes of spraying this. It is INTENSELY non-smelly What a shame though because the notes are some of my favorites in perfumes. Meeehhhh. Wish they could darken some of the notes.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: similar type of scent like Vera Wang Princess - a light, non-offensive, fruity-flowery aquatic vanilla-chocolate scent. very girly and juvenille. nice but too light

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: This has become my winter go-to for the office. You smell sweet but not too sugary and it's softly non-offensive. Lingers on clothes for a day or 2 though. I like the current version.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: The first time i tried this perfume, it was just been released, immediately the memory of me playing with my Barbies as a child came to my mind. Of course is not the “smell of a doll”, but it truly brought me to that times of beautiful childhood. I bought it many times and it replaced Kenzo Amour from being my signature scent. I used only this perfume for 2-3 years and i loved it. Reading the comments before mine, i started to think that something must have changed. Perfumes on me don’t last, but with Ck One shock, though it’s an EDT, i never thought it did’t last enough. However, I would not be surprised, trying a new bottle, to realize that it has been reformulated and, as always, ruined.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I remember smelling this and thinking it was the first Calvin Klein fragrance I've ever really enjoyed...still not enough to ever purchase it, though

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I wore this as a teenager and I loved it. Everyone is talking about the short longevity but for some reason this would sit on my skin and clothes for the whole day. My classmates always told me that everytime I arrived late for class (almost every day haha) this sweet fruity smell would fill up the classroom. I don´t use it anymore, for me it´s a very girly scent, even tho i still love sweet candy gourmand scents. I will always associate this with my youth :)

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: This has the shortest longevity of anything I've ever sprayed. It's worse than cheap body sprays. It lasts about 30 minutes, whether it is on clothes or skin. After that I have to put my nose directly over where it was sprayed and even then it's faint. If it lasted longer, even a couple hours, it would be a winner. I can't say it's a good value even though it's cheap, because there is nothing you can do with a scent that only lasts 30 minutes.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I received this as a gift from my fiancé, and I must say it is the Worse fragrance I ever owned. I swear on my skin it smells like spice pepper and not the nice note, the cooking pepper that my mom uses while making soup.
The smell lingers around for a while, but maybe that is only because I dislike it so much. I gave this perfume 3 chances, the 3rd time I had a headache and a strong urge to vomit. I don't know why i am not sensing any flower or chocolate notes. To sum it up, I straight up hate this one. Sorry CK, and to those of you who actually enjoy this perfume.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Nothing shocking about this one. It’s so mild you might just forget you’re wearing it. Or more likely it’s worn off! A perfect perfume to wear when you just don’t feel like anything overpowering. So light and kind to coworkers or intimate partners who don’t want to get a headache. It doesn’t last long, but the bottle is HUGE and inexpensive so who cares?

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I'm using this up as an expensive room spray

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: So the only thing that shocked me about this fragrance is how little it lasts. I think I get like three hours max and that's if I sprinkle this stuff like holy water at Mass. Really? These fragrance makers are playing us for fools. Release after release with zero testing. Bottle it up put a name on it and they'll buy it anyway. Yeah well CK got me again because this does smell nice and it's available super cheap on at the discount stores. I would never pay more than $10 bucks for a 100ml because the longevity is bad.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I was super skeptical when I blind bought this but I ADORE IT! I didn't feel fond of the idea of mixing fruit with chocolate or vanilla but wow. It definitely still has the DNA of the original CK One but sweeter/more gourmand. I personally love more indulgent scents but this allows me to where something along those lines but still works in the heat and summertime without being out of place. Reallyyyy like this, super impressed

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I really enjoy the contrast of fresh, tart, almost green fruity floral notes and sweet, creamy vanilla and chocolate in this. The passion flower stands out and gives the juicy blackberry and airy peony an extra kick. The chocolate is on the milky and light side, it reminds me of a chocolate and vanilla milkshake. In the drydown the whole composition also makes me think of chocolates with berry filling. The fragrance has a slightly synthetic and oily vibe, but I like it, it keeps CK One Shock from being boring.

I don't understand all the complaints about longevity, I can smell this on me all day which is not especially noteworthy for my perfume-friendly skin, but obviously not bad. It's just not the most intense fragrance on earth, so a couple more sprays won't hurt. A happy and comforting scent, especially nice for warmer days, but I also love to wear it right now in cool spring weather.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: You will get an interesting sour scent at first then it will turn into not-so-good generic sweet perfume, nothing to amaze, nothing to gag over, it’s very boring. I don’t think it would be safe blind buy since it’s too soft, the longevity fades within an hour, the scent is ok like you’ve smelled this a million times before.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
i think i've acquired a liking for this because the first time i sniffed it i remember not liking it because it was too strong. so then i gave it to my mother because it was a blind buy. but after i kept smelling it on her i grew to love it. it's cheaper compared to a lot of perfumes but it really doesn't smell cheap at all. the drydown is just so good and i do smell the chocolate but it blended so well with all the other notes

i might not buy this for myself because i have now associated this with my mother but i would say this is one of my favorites of hers (and fav one to borrow!)

also i think this works for anyone no matter what age!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I tested this one again to give it another chance. Here are my thoughts:

This is a fruity-musky-vanilla. It is pleasant but nothing groundbreaking to me. I found it enjoyable to wear, but I kept wishing it was a bit louder. Maybe it's my fault for wearing too much perfume all the time, but when it comes to quiet scents like this, I find it hard to appreciate them.. I wish they would speak up!

On me, this is a skin-scent from beginning to end. Even upon first spritz, it was hard to make out the notes, for me. I got a fruity vibe, although didnt really feel like blackberry to me. Just tuttifrutti. And I got vanilla and sweetness. I could smell musk. And that was it.

Do I hate it? No. It's an allright, for me.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: This is def an elegant gourmand perfume, nothing fresh and aqcuatic like the original ck one. Having said that, it's boring and generic high end headachy perfume. I was expecting the freshness but felt short. If you're into strong yellow perfumes like ysl manifesto, burberry body, mk wonderlust you may like this. But if you're like me who likes Burberry sheer, ck one, tommy girl, I don't think you will enjoy this at all.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: the notes of this fragrance hype it up way more than what it actually is. take out about 75% of the notes, keep vanilla, black berry, and musk. it smells like if Paris Hilton got a hold of lancomes formula for hypnose and deliberately watered it down to specifically sell in midwest strip malls. it doesn't smell bad, its just SO safe and does absolutely nothing for me. I blind bought a 6.8 ounce bottle of this for like 12 bucks, so basically 2 cups of coffee lmao. it was pleasant, so I used it as a room spray until half was gone. I dumped the other half as I couldn't bother having my room smell like CK ONE shock any longer. bleh.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I’m so happy I’ve found this! I’ve been on the hunt for a new signature scent and probably tried dozens of scents recently but haven’t found The One. This might be it.

It starts off fruity and fresh, a bit citrusy tart then turns into juicy wildberries and mellows out to a light vanilla whipped cream with a hint of milk chocolate in the dry down. Not synthetic at all. It’s beautifully soft, lightly sweet but that’s perfect for me as I’ve found most vanilla/gourmand scents to be too sickly sugary or powdery and others to be too floral/perfumey and I don’t like anything woody.

I agree with the other reviews that the longevity isn’t great (~2hours) and doesn’t have great sillage - sticks pretty close to the skin but it’s pretty cheap for a big bottle so happy to spritz more of it throughout the day. A perfect mix of light, fresh, summery and sweet and comforting.

Testing this in winter.

I also love YSL Mon Paris and Chloé Nomade but they are so expensive!

***UPDATE: Bought a 200mL bottle for USD$30. Actually lasts all day if you spray on clothes, weak sillage though (2 inches).

***FURTHER UPDATE: The more I wear it the more I like it. It’s just right for me, a fresh and fruity, a little floral, soft edible milky chocolate and vanilla on the dry down. I don't get any patchouli at all (which is great as I'm not a fan). Fresh fun and also comforting. I’ve tried over 40 fragrances in the last couple of months and I keep coming back to this. I do have to reapply often but I’m ok with that, only wish it had a bit better sillage.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: The reviews are so positive, it seems to be a gourmand indeed, a berry, vanilla chocolate fragrance that is sure to please apparently. It also seems very poor in longevity, sillage, I think if you want a durable chocolate scent look at SJP Covet perhaps.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
This the mom version of Fantasy by Britney Spears. Sweet scent. That will appeal more to younger crowd and younger moms but is also nice on all ages. Mass appeal would be for those who like a sweet but light scent for the daytime.

EDIT: FANTASY without the kiwi zing!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
It's fruity yet not too feminine, it's warm and sweet, but at the same time, it's wearable and office friendly. The only issue I have with this fragrance is longevity. However, since it costs less than average CK perfume.
My skin highlights chocolate and vanilla notes more than berries.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I wanted to love this, and it smells light, fruity, sweet, and lovely when I spray it. BUT it lasts 5-10 minutes. I am not kidding. What is going on? I got a 200 ml bottle too, trusting it to be nice since I usually love the CK line. I have put it in the bedroom to use as room freshener. Sad face.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
The bottle:
Simple & boring.

Inside the bottle:
Sweet & light are the words to describe this perfume.When sprayed you get a blast of blackberries & Mexican chocolate that gives the perfume a bit of a power scent because of it and vanilla. When dried you get hints of florals but very faint.Longevity is okay more on the poor side and will be light in the skin.

Overall:
This perfume is great for someone who loves sweet scent and who are sensitive to perfume. Too bad this one might only last a couple hours. It's a very pretty scent.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
On me, Starts off true to the votes with a vanilla and adding a little blackberry. Then makes a small change of floraly fresh and vanilla. Can't smell a big patchouli note but very subtly there near the dry down.

I'm not a huge fan of it but it is nice and I could see myself wearing it when I don't need longevity (which seems to be 2-3 hours on me) to the beach or pool maybe? As it is inexpensive ($30 for 200ml in Australia) you can smell good and not worry about it possible washing off.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Shock is a light and sweet, easy to wear daytime scent. I really have been enjoying it in warm weather when I want sweetness but nothing sickening or heavy. It has an unexpected fresh and tart vibe to it, from the blackberry and passionflower. It allllmost gets a little sour for me but never quite goes there. I think Shock is easily likeable, but I can see why some people feel it's boring. But for me, this combination of notes I find quirky and unique. Longevity is not so great though; I usually end up refreshing it after 2 hours.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I really liked Shock.. at first. It's super sweet and fruity with a hint of spiciness when I first apply it. However, after a few minutes the fragrance betrays me and turns into something dirty and sour. Perhaps it's the jasmine and patchouli notes. Or the chemistry of my skin. Either way, I cannot wear this, the drydown makes me wanna gag a little bit.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Like a lot of other dark fruity frags on the market (Euphoria, La Petite Robe Noire and others). Blackberry, some peony and passionflower, patchouli, musk. Berry madness. But dark, night berries.Vanilla in the base in the final drydown when the berry toned down.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: It was love at first sniff when I bought it years ago, but I never managed to finish my bottle. The stuff is very sugary syrupy sweet. Delicious though, but still.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: How in the world did this get labeled as a spicy oriental? This is certainly a fruity floral gourmand. I blind bought last night at Marshall’s. I don’t dislike it, but I wasn’t prepared for it to be so sweet! I think I can pull this off in the Summer. I may try layering it with White Diamonds Luster to temper the sweetness. It has a strong sweetness, berry and almost a milk creaminess to it. Sillage is close to the skin, more like a body spray. I was expecting more spice from the floral. But I really enjoy going to Marshall’s and taking a chance on a blind buy. So sometimes you end up with something unexpected. I’d suggest testing this out unless you like sweet fruity fragrances and are not expecting much longevity or sillage.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
It's the second time I rebuy Shock!
A perfect choice for spring and summertime. A typical daytime perfume, but you have to use it more during the day, cause it's soft, and it will not stay on your skin for the whole day.I like that it's sweet but still fresh, and the fact that it has a very good price too, makes it worth to buy, even if I use it a lot.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: The only reason that keeps me away from buying this are the first 30 min which are meh... and kind of sour. But then it develops and has the most gorgeous gourmand drydown on me. Also it leaves a divine smell on clothes, beautiful sweetness, not cloying. Yes, it’s not that strong but it doesn’t have to be. Anyway, i’m still on the fence with this one...

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I kind of tired of the CK One range in the 90's to be honest as everyone wore it back then. I do appreciate that this is a completely different fragrance though and after hearing a few rave reviews that it is better than it seems I purchased a bottle blindly. It is a nice floral fruity with mild staying power. I agree that it is better than you would expect based on looking at the bottle but it is not a favorite or anything like that. It is quite tropical and fun. I don't quite get why this is in the CK one line as it has nothing in common with CK one. I think it really needed its own name and a different design bottle. The bottle design is annoying - you remove the cap that seals the fragrance and insert the sprayer nozzle meaning that unless you switch over to the cap if it is pressed it will spray and prone to leaking. A bit unnecessary and impracticle especially for travelling. Besides that it is a decent bargain buy.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I dont hate it, its still wearable, but its too light even for summer. I also get some weird -almost medicinal- smell when I first spray it which kind of reminds me of the perfumes you find in drugstores, thankfully it fades away.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I think the bottle is ugly where as the CK One see through bottle is pretty.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: It's fine... Nothing great or bad, just fine. Someone said it was more like a body mist and I feel that to be true. For summer I suppose it would be a good scent. It's just entirely too light for this time of year.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I really like this one!
It was a blind purchase for me, so I was worried it would smell very unisex like a lot of the other CK scents. But not at all! It´s definitely a feminine fragrance although if you´re a man and want to wear this.. do it! =)

It´s Fresh, slightly sweet, slightly floral and after a while on the skin it warms up and I can detect some of the chocolate and vanilla.

It´s mainly a fresh fragrance though, very suitable for daytime use. Work/school whatever. =)

I truly enjoy this one, bought 50ml, next time I´m getting the huge 200ml bottle! =D

Sillage and Longevity are quite weak though.. It lasts on my skin for about 2-3 hours and the sillage ain´t heavy what so ever. It´s soft but you definitly notice it and I feel like it leaves and slight trail of scent after me. =)

SO WORTH it for me. Perfect Spring/Summer/Fall scent. It´s fall now and I think it works perfectly because it´s fresch and nice to use for those crisp fall days! =)

RATE: 6.5/10

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I've wanted this for a while now and i finally got it in a swap. CK Shock has shocked me! I love this much more than I thought possible. The CK DNA is there but shock added the right ingredients to make this a fragrance for women. I can smell berries and just the right amount of sweetness that the berries and the vanilla and cocoa aren't battling each other for domination. Only complaint is that it's longevity and sillage aren't that great, but when I was looking at the prices for it i can't complain. I can spray spray spray away as liberally as I want.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Very sweet scent. It is typical washed down berry type of scent and it doesn't last long. Nothing wrong with it is just nothing special and I gave my bottle to someone who's more into this type of fragrance.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Happy creamy vanilla berry. Fresh and fruity at first then cools down to a soft creamy berry

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I had this one two or three years ago.I like it but very young for me so I give it to my daughter.I can't smell chocolate or flowers.I only smell berry that is more like raspberry sweet sugar notes and vanilla.it's very sweet and beautiful and girly.it's not heavy so it's sweet smell doesn't hurt.it is not spicy.I'm sure it is floralfruity gourmand.it's a happy and young perfume.a pink perfume.very good for young girls.longevity is four hours but very more on clothes
5/10
عطر خوبی هست که چند سال پیش داشتم و صلاح دیدم به دخترم بدم.من هیچ شکلات و کاکائو و گل حس نمیکنم.فقط تمشک و نت های شیرین و قند و وانیل.اصلا ادویه ای نیست.من مطمئنم فلورال فروتی گورماند هست.عطر جوان و شادی هست.صورتی شاد و بااینکه خیلی شیرین هست چون سبکه اذیت کننده نیست.برای دخترهای کم سن و نوجوان خیلی خوبه.ماندگاری چهارساعت اما ذوی لباس خیلی بیشتر
۵/۱۰

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Oriental spicy??? What? No, no, no this is a gourmand fruity scent. VW Princess is wayyyy more floral than this one. This is soft and sweet, kinda V&R Flowerbomb or Body Shop Black Musk kinda sweet but with waaay less }POW{. My fave so far with Chocolate are Angel and Rhianna Rebel (love those two!). But this is nice. Not sure I will keep it though just because it's kinda like some others I have ( for some reason- probs the blackberry/currant vibe, this reminds me of Jimmy Choo Exotic). Def a close/skin scent which makes this safe for work and play but not a night out kinda scent (to me). I get basically all blackberry with some vanilla and then it dries down to just being a soft and sweet scent... Body shop made a Smoky Poppy which has the poppy but I don't think they smell similar. Overall a OK scent. But I think I will be returning this anyway as I have others similar and don't need to spend the money on this but I am def on the "fence" about returning and keeping it lol ;)

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Beautiful soft comforting sweet scent on a bed of vanilla laced with rich luxurious chocolate undertones. I really love this scent in winter, it is cosy does not project much and is definitely a skin scent. I hardly ever reach for it throughout the year, but in winter when I am at home or running errands I often reach for this as I find it warming and comforting. It is sweet, but not sharp or synthetically sweet- it smells naturally sweet thanks to an overdose of sugar vanilla and luscious chocolate. It also smells some what milky and musky to me which I really like- I do detect a creamy vanilla muskiness on dry down. This makes for a very safe gift, some may find it boring, but offensive it could never be. It does actually last quite a while on skin, but even longer on clothes. On clothes it smells like a luxurious clothes conditioner. This scent is cosy and comforting it is a soft sweet scent done well in my opinion. The name shock is very misleading- as the shock appeal is something it is not. It is safe soft weak but comforting nevertheless, perfect for casual winter days when you want to feel cosy, comfy and snug.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Love the scent. Too bad it is quite weak. I won't buy it again altough I really really love the smell.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Smells like a berry yoghurt mix with some chocolate undertones.
The biggest shock here is that this beauty lasts barely a hour before it is gone like the remnants of a fleeting summer romance.
Scent is 8 out of 10
But its lack of longevity and silage and I give it a 3 out of 10.
All in all I give this a 5 out of 10 if only it wasn't so fleeting.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I may have reviewed this already but I just have to say that this is the only perfume I have bought again after finishing a bottle.
My daughter always says this is the scent that reminds her of mom. And my male co-workers (who always comment the "perfume smell" after our female boss has been around) say to me that I smell nice. So this is my everyday scent. Everybody seems to like it, so it's "safe" to wear. And I just bought my third bottle. Sad that it is harder to find these days...
Warm, clean, berryish, sweet and smooth.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
The main accords look right.
This is like a very light EDT for me. Poor lasting power, but again, fine for a spare in the car or something.
Come to think of it, this might be good, as well as Cl in2u her for a teen

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I got in from a lovely Friend-Fragrantican as a gift a few days ago and she really made my day - well, not just day but a week, a month, the whole season!:))) It's a perfect summer scent which lasts forever on my skin - but it's not the typical calone type of scent that I tend to associate with summer/beach/sea - a completely different one. It's the kind of scent that reminds me of exotic drinks, sun lotion and warm breeze but not salty water, melon or anything like these. I have cacao note in most perfumes but here it is perfectly balanced with fruity and other notes, not irritating or nauseating. A work of art for me, and surprise surprise - it's Calvin Klein! For me the mood it brings on is rather Jennifer Lopez or Escada-like one. I like this type of surprises!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Gourmand and young but modern and urban. This does not smells innocent or very girly, i would rather say it has some maturity to it. An unpretentious but good perfume. Worth trying if you like sweet perfumes but is tired of the ordinary gourmands.
Main notes for me are chocolate and the berries.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: And , on me, so fleeting... Probably the least longevity on perfume I have felt that is not due to anosmia.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I don't think I've hated the top notes of any fragrance more. It's so citric and sharp. I'm adding passion fruit flower to my list of most hated notes along side red and black currant, vetiver and cedar. However, I can handle even my most hated notes in a fragrance, if they are submissive to notes I love or don't last long. This fragrance the passion fruit flower is gone almost as quickly as it comes, thank goodness! The top is a nose itching, eye watery blast of citric acid. Then that burns off with record quickness. In its place emerges a candy sweet combination of what smells like strawberry milk and a dash of cocoa powder. It's not a heavy fragrance though. Far from being heavy, it's light and watery. Strawberry milk scented sugar water with a hint of powdered chocolate and florals. It's so light I think you could pour the bottle on yourself and not offend anyone around you. It's a summer gourmand as odd as that sounds. I think it's pretty, comforting and easy to wear in the drydown. It's not ground breaking or swoon worthy, but it's a nice change from sticky sweet, heavy scents so popular these days. It's not often I find myself describing a scent as both sweet, gourmand AND light and watery.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Wow, this is seriously yummy (first few hours especially). Strawberry Milkshake is what I got right off the bat. Thick, creamy, jammy and sweet. Gets more 'jammy' overtime and less milky/creamy though. Like a jam of ripe and juicy forest berries. Hours later, I still get berry jam but with the bitterness of patchoulli developing (not too keen on this), it gets darker. I didn't really get the cocoa...maybe a little in the drydown, but I had trouble detecting it. It's on the light and casual side as far as gourmands are concerned, not a heavy-duty one (like LVEB for instance). A good thing in this case, as it would be very nauseating if it were louder. This scent could work all year round, great for casual fall/winter wear and won't be too much for the breezier summer days/nights. Very good longevity (7 hours +, and I still get faint whiffs 10 hours later) and moderate sillage.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Warm, very light. Didn't last long enough on me, I gave it away. Perfectly acceptable frag, not a heavy at all, warm, a bit sweet, a bit of a fruity edge in there. Prob the main accords say it all. A friend of mine would really suit this as she doesn't have issue with staying power. I would say it's fine for the office etc

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
For me this is all blackcurrant and chocolate. It's creamy and sweet without being bitter or synthetic smelling. It's a little unusual but still fairly safe, I can't imagine many people would hate it and I really, really like the scent.

What I don't like is how weak it is. It sits extremely close to the skin meaning even a second after spraying I can only detect its scent if I bring a wrist up to my nose and sniff. It gradually seems to get weaker to until, after an hour at the most, it's completely gone.

So disappointing because I really enjoy the scent and it's a pretty cheap scent these days too.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: CK One Shock for Her on me stays about 10 minutes with the softest sillage and then disappears.It is the worst performance scent I have ever tried.For the brief period I smell , it is a very sweet berries-chocolate combo.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I should have gotten this a long time ago. This scent is so good and I found another staple. It smells modern and fun. I wish they only made it more long lasting. I love fruity scents and this one is fruity yet not overpowering. I can also detect the different levels of notes - starts fruity and drys down to chocolate scent. This is a understated perfume. I wish others would give this a try

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: This reminded me of my fav soymilk berry yoghurt haha, so i had to try it and get it. I'm not really fan of CK or even a fan of light&fruity fragrances, but I'M LOVING THIS. I'm getting a lot of sweet yummy berries and vanilla from it. Lasting power could be better!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I bought this perfume because out of the bottle it smelled like something I used to have as a child and I felt nostalgic. Also, the bottle looks really cool and I generally like CK fragrances. I did not regret buying it because it's a very delicate and happy summer fragrance, but I wish it had better lasting power. My skin usually kills all perfume pretty quickly and that's why I mostly wear heavy vanilla and oriental scents. But sometimes I wish I was able to wear something this light without it disappearing completely in 20 minutes! It's still a nice addition to my collection.
The first spray was very refreshing and citrusy on me and I'm surprised there are no citrus notes listed. After a few seconds, it's a full on berry burst which is lovely! I mostly get blackberry, vanilla and chocolate but there's some additional milky creaminess and I'm not sure where it comes from. I can also distinguish the amber and the musk, but the florals don't come forward to me at all. Maybe I detect a hint of jasmine, but other than that it's all sugar, vanilla and berries.
I can picture myself wearing this on a summer afternoon or in early spring - it's really a perfect scent for warm weather. The longevity and the sillage are my only problems with CK One Shock. After 20-30 minutes I can only detect it if I put my nose directly against my wrist. It's a shame because this could be one of my favorite summer perfumes!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
For girls who want to settle with a beautiful "beef," CK One Shok the female version is an excellent choice, despite being super "more of the same" he pleases and ensures a median perfuming quite engaging. It's a pretty girl scent gourd, high nymphet the nth degree, I can not imagine him in more mature women, not that they do not can use it, but is more the shape of young women "innocent" of this life! Its opening is a soft floral reminding Natura Chronos skin products because of Passiflora flower (passion flower) that has a hint middle citric velvety too delicious, reminiscent of the fruit itself, however, can be more exotic and acceptable. Then he becomes a well beaten fruity, added to hot melted chocolate in a double boiler over some jasmine notes sweetened by Amora also silky, giving the impression of a simple scent but well redondinho. Its base is its best phase in my view, first, because it casts quite coming and going pleasing to the wearer without harming those who are nearby, second, by becoming an amber oriental heated super cozy and behaved, and third, for further remind the girl stereotype gourd and high nymphet to the nth degree with more precision and intensity. In short, it is a fragrance that can hardly fail to please, is not as sweet, is not so serious, is not so powerful and so only perfumão, a scent medium to joy of the young ladies!

Word of the day: gourd... (day 54)

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I love this fragrance. It's really packs a punch, is sweet yet floral. It last a fairly long time too if you spray it on clothing rather than your skin. The only thing is the dispenser. You unscrew the metal cap and the stick on a cheap-feeling, plastic disperser. The metal lid does not go back on top so it doesn't look the prettiest on your shelf. It's a nice perfume and I got it on special offer, I think if I found it going cheap I would get it again but I'm a bit of a bottle collector so don't think I would get it when the bottle is so plain and the top is so nasty. If you don't care about bottle appearance and only what's on the inside then I would recommend it if you like sweet, fruity and floral scents.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Smelt too much like rice pudding with bits of fruit in it for me. Gave it to my sister and she loves it, so each to their own i guess.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: This is an oriental-floral? :/ On me this is purely a sweet, gentle, slightly floral gourmand, with the vanilla and chocolate the only intensive notes on my skin until the drydown where I get a wisp of blackberry and an even fainter musk. The other listed notes are not appearing at all to my nose, but I'm not even mad about that (especially the absence of patchouli which I have a difficult relationship with), LOL! I am really enjoying this scent and seriously considering purchasing a larger bottle once my little sample runs out.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Sure is it weak, minotaur, nobody makes strong stuff in 200ml bottles. U have to consider it as a body splash

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Delicious and fresh, but disappears instantly. You could actually spray this is in a car or elevator as it's so weak.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
For girls who likes sweet, gourmand and suprisingly(!) light perfumes, this one is for you! This is nothing special, it has this sweet, close to skin vanilla scent to it, something for a teenager or a young woman.

(I'd rather call this a bodymist than EDT)

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: A pleasing scent. Strong sour notes, with passionflower and blackberry. It's a bit watery to be truly gourmand, although there is some sweet vanilla. It smells nice, I like the way it dries down with the patchouli and musk. I also like that it doesn't disappear on drydown. For an EDT, it does last well - I could smell one spray strongly even throughout two hours of swimming! If you like Taylor Swift Incredible Things, this one smells similar (to me.)

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: yummy vanilla/chocolate/berry ice!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Another great scent by CK! This one is sweet with vanilla and creaminess to it with hints of red berries too! I wore this all summer when I first got it and would highly recommend it you like the fruity sweet berry scents! :)

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I thought that it's something gourmand, but it's like S by Shakira Eau Florale. Pale berries water(

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Smells like a frozen yogurt with powdery synthetic blackberry(not juicy,but tart) no chocolate,theres a light calming effect from the passionflower and those 3 are the dominant notes,its okay,very soft and no sillage,longevity is probably 10 minutes then gone
Scent 6
Unique 1
Bottle 7
Sillage 2
Longevity 2
Repurchase? No

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
:):)A very very mellow and comforting vanilla scent. I love how low-key and easy to wear this is.

I found the removable nozzle of the CK one series very interesting. When I first smelled this from the bottle, I got a hint of citrusy berries, a gush of alcohol and some vanilla. It was very light like coconut water almost. On my skin, the citrusy alcohol smell faded in 5 minutes and left with only vanilla. It smelled very soothing. As time passed, the vanilla scent became stronger, and within a hour it turned into a buttery chocolate. It was very yummy but still very light and comforting like the smell from the downstairs kitchen when you mom was baking cookies.

I sprayed this on at night after shower. The chocolatey scent lasted on my arms for a long time. I could still smell it after the next morning. That was nearly 10 hours! But I suppose it wouldn't last this long if you were out going about your day. But I wouldn't mind constantly reapplying this since this scent is such a yummy treat. And it's so comforting that it won't offend anyone.

This one is not a love, but I like the simplicity of it. :) :)

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Ck One Shock is a perfectly pleasant scent. It has all the notes I usually adore in one package. But that is all it is ...pleasant... nice little fruity vanilla floral. I was craving a bit of naughty a little bit of "skank" from the Patchouli mixed in . But no.... its just nice.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Its just very basic and synthetic..i thought it was going to be better than dark kiss by bath & body works or falling in love by philosophy,or maybe trish mcevoy no.9 because of the blackcurrant vanilla combo,it smells okay,i dont smell cacao,smells like black star by avril lavigne,not bad but no shock at all,the bottle is gorgeous though,and price is really cheap i got a 100ml for $25 but i know there are cheaper prices

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I honestly cannot figure out why they named this CK One “Shock” because the only thing shocking about this fragrance is the utter lack of silage and longevity. And this is coming from a life-long, card carrying member of the Undersprayers Club who rarely sprays more than 3 sprays of any fragrance, even the ones others describe as weak or low-silage.

Despite this, I do like the fragrance. On me it’s berries and vanilla with subtle undertones of mixed flowers—sweet and summery without being syrupy or cloying. I’ve read that it was designed as a summer fragrance and I believe it—I can’t imagine over-applying this, even on the hottest of days. I applied about 6-7 sprays of this on a recent hot day and could barely smell it after 90 minutes! I don’t regret buying this, but only because I got a fabulous deal on a 100ml bottle that was on clearance at a local department store.

I would only recommend buying this if you can get it at a reduced price and are looking for a subtle fruity scent.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I got a 200 ML bottle of this from my fiance for Christmas last year. He knows my signature scent is Euphoria, so he got me another CK fragrance.
I thought it was a bit weak for the 2014/15 winter so I've saved it for this summer. Good thing I did. It works perfectly for hot summer days. It's very refreshing, yet sophisticated. I love the fruity opening, and I love when it dries down to coco. I read online that Calvin Klein made this for summer use, which makes sense. I do have to reapply it, but I would rather do that then have a super-strong fume in the summer.
Overall, I really love this scent in warmer weather.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
what kind of water did I just spray on me? I like the milky white bottle but this juice has zero strength, I can barely smell something.. fruity..? Explains the huge bottle: 5 sprays and still smell nothing and I have a good nose.
What if the knock offs on ebay have a stronger smell lol Its possible.. This is a joke.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Huele bien pero estoy absolutamente decepcionada....es un frutal con olor a frambuesas o frutillas con vainilla, el olor al chocolate es demasiado suave, no se parece en nada al perfume de shakira( el cual huele mucho mejor). No lo recomiendo la duración es pésima y prácticamente no se siente en la piel. Por ese precio hay perfumes mucho pero mucho mejores.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: It's okay, but I don't mind to use this just as a safe daily use during summer, it's light but weak.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I'm not too sure about this one. I've owned it for a while and I wear it sometimes, but it's not my favourite. To me it's very generic - there's nothing special or unique about it. I feel neutral towards this one.

I own a small bottle of it and it's usually in my bag if I need to re-apply my perfume during the day, but it's never my first choice in the morning. In other words it's there in case of emergencies. By the way, the bottle is AWFUL! Calvin Klein seriously need to get some new designers on the scene.

Haven't quite made up my mind about this one.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
To me, this smells exactly like The Body Shop's Raspberry body butter. I love that body butter, however I have mostly moved on from fruity gourmands.

It's executed well for a fruity gourmand. Especially compared to Yves Rocher Framboise (which smells more like raspberry lollipop), this has much more class.

Oh and, say what you will, but that bottle is ugly. Put this in a cutesy bottle and THEN I might consider.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I am a man but i tend to have experience with it.
This is the perfume i bought to my girlfriend and she likes it.
I found it on an Airport Duty Free Shop and sprayed it on a test sheet and tested how it was.
At first, though it is not on the note pyramid, but i got the sweet aroma of strawberry, then it dried down to an intoxicating mix with vanilla, it was a really sweet smell.
Then after a few minutes i got the smell of chocolate, now no strawberry at all but chocolate not too heavy but a little bit of chocolatish smell, but i got the vanilla all the time.
Definitely a buy if u r into vanilla type of scents
and it has a good projection (not a beast)
and longevity mayb as far as i remember it lasted 5-6 hours give or take on my girlfriend. She loves the perfume tbh.
TO conclude, great scent at a low rate.
So here goes my rating -
Scent - 8/10
Projection - 5/10
Longevity - 5/10
overall - 7/10

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Overall, a decent scent but not for me. The bottle comes with a removable cap so I actually stuck some skewers into mine and turned into a reed diffuser xD
Th scent is not bad, but not something I would grab for. I can see how some others might like it, as it's not really offensive or strong or sharp.

The perfume reminds me of more of a gourmand than an oriental, and I get no floral from it. It reminds me a lot of Vera Wang Princess, with it's cocoa notes almost making the scent milky.

Smells like maybe you were just baking cookies, or in a chocolate shop, with a slight freshness underneath and some slightly detectable perfumatice notes like amber and musk, which stop the scent from being too sugary or sweet and round it out a bit.

Anyways, I am more of a fan of 'shampoo' scents so this was not up my alley, but it is not bad, and if you like chocolatey scents or you like 'Escada Magnetism' or 'Vera Wang Princess' than I would recommend it.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Yes it is sweet, but fades super fast. The opening of this perfume is hard to describe - it smells like a plastic bag at first :/

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I read the reviews then I tried this one and I'm in shock. Every review say "sweet". Chocalate sweet or sugar sweet, bon bons or buble gum etc. I couldn't feel any of them. I feel only fresh lemony water. Maybe I have a flu and I couldn't smell I don't know.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
It smells wonderful, but if you expect your fragrances to last long then I say keep looking. However, I think it would be perfect if you're looking for something refreshing to throw into your gym bag when you need an after workout spritz since it lasts longer than your average body splash.

I blind-bought the 3.4 oz bottle, and I only really use it to spray around my bedroom before I go to sleep or when I am lounging around the house.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
i really love this perfume !
when i first smelled this i had to have it !
just nice and sweet not to overpowering at all
a women once told me i had a really nice smell coming from me .

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
For some reason, I dig cacao scent lately, and CK One Shock for her provides me with 200ml of it.

This fragrance is playful.
I love the playful-flirty scent of Paco Rabanne's Black XS for Her, but I somehow consider it to be waaay too strong for day-use. CK One Shock for Her is the answer for light cocoa to be worn during the day.

However, due to its playful nature.. If you are a person who works professionally in the office and looking for perfume to be worn for work, this might not be your best choice.

Opening is hell of a fruitish spray, but the middle notes are just awesome. Sweet flirty chocolate that lingers for couple hours before fading into beautiful powdery musky vanilla.

Sadly, this fragrance is only for the user to enjoy.
Sillage is close to none, although stays for quite considerable length of time.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
BONBONS, bubble gum sweet.
It is pleasant, but I find it very childish.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I loved the bottle but however thats where it ends, straight to my gym bag this one goes, it's very much like a deodorant.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Well I will have to agree that it is not a perfume that it is noticeable or you will remember forever. It starts fruity and it becomes powedery-creamy. Its sillage is almost unnoticeable even to me. Unless I put half of the bottle, it will evaporate in 2h maximum. The sillage is very close to the skin. It is a nice smell indeed, but not something unforgetable or special. No wonder it is on offer these days. But, if you find it for a good price then why not? I don't find it offensive, but not something special and seriously I wonder how this can be regarded as oriental spicy...

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: This is my favorite. When I smell this , I feel like a birthday cake .

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: sweet, tart and yummy. Not as good as Calypso St. Barth 'Lily' ...but it smells like someone wanted to make a copy of it and added vanilla to disguise its similarity. still very nice, might be a good winter alternative to my beloved 'summery' Lily. :)

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I'm assuming the slightly tart floral I smell at the beginning is the passion flower, but I'm not familiar enough with the flower to say. Whatever it is, it's a pretty unique note and a nice surprise to see pop up in the fruity floral market. I only get the merest hints of what I think might be dark chocolate.

It doesn't have much sillage as a light EDT, but it has a sightly different attitude than your typical "pink" fragrance. There's the popular berries and vanilla combo, yes. But it also has a spicy, tangy kick to it. Nothing punk rock, mind you.

This is a case of the bottle not doing the scent justice. CK One Shock isn't shocking or juvenile and the same goes for her twin brother. Also, it bears no resemblance to CK One. None. I really think Calvin Klein missed an opportunity by not releasing this set as something different altogether and, consequently, they've gone largely ignored. The only shock is what an injustice that is.

Basically, it smells good. At that price, it won't hurt you to try it.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I had loved this parfume when I didint have but after I had bought this parfume I bored that just a few weeks later. Its too sugary and bland fragrance. not strong not permenent at all at least for my skin...

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: It smells like sugar water and flowers. I like it, makes you feel sweet and fresh. Its a perfect everyday scent.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I like Shock very much.
It's sweet and powdery and you can really smell the chocolate and vanilla.
There's a faint touch of florals but overall it's just really sweet.
I really like it but longevity is ridicoulus it just doesn't hold more than half an hour.
So not a keeper

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Amoras, amoras ou morangos? Doce e muito jovem.
No máximo 4 horas de fixação!

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: I do like this perfume. The packaging is especially cute; this is DEFINITELY one to be displayed! It is, to me, a playful and summery scent, and it is nothing at all like CK One. However, the scent does not linger on my skin for very long-- I get around 3 hours out of it, then I can't even tell I had it on, which I find disappointing since all of my other CK fragrance have amazing lasting power. But, for a lunch trip or a short excursion, this is definitely a great perfume to put on.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
I wanted to spray something on my wrist in the shop, and this just happened to be on sale so it caught my eye.

I like CK fragrances in general, and recently tested several of their fragrances for men - it made me nostalgic about the 90s!

I loved CK One Shock (for women) within a minute of spraying it on my skin - what a pleasant surprise!

It's not your typical fresh CK fragrance - it's obviously not meant to be as the notes are something totally different.

I detected the cacao and vanilla in it. I couldn't identify the other exact notes in it, but I loved it in general.

Sweet, without being too sweet. Comforting, without being overpowering. Young, without being too young.

I live in a hot climate and it's a very hot summer day today - this fragrance worked in this weather, but I could imagine it in the autumn and winter too. (Simply because there's something so comforting about it - perhaps the chocolate and vanilla?)

The only minus for me is the dry down. It's just not that pleasant. And it came a little too quickly, maybe after about 2 hours or so.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
At first when I sprayed it, it smelled like an alcoholic drink.
Then suddenly it turned very sweet.
I think it smells a little like hair conditioner.
I can sense fruity notes and sweetness from vanilla and chocolate.
Actually, there's nothing shocking about it, it's just another sweet fruity scent.
I'm also afraid that sillage and longevity might be quite bad.
Not bad, but a little unoriginal.

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content: Only thing shocking about this is the sillage. Doesn't last long at all. Yes its sweet but in a yoghurt & synthetic way. I expected that there would be a twist of some sort. Inoffensive but boring. Don't buy this if you are looking for something new or unusual. You will be disappointed

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Kinda reminds me of Katy Perry's meow but the coco makes a big difference. Soft and sweet
Found this at tjmaxx for 19.99 for a 3.4 ounce. Not bad at all. I will say the only con to this is the lasting power. It last about 3hours on my skin. Which is okay when your use to 6 to 7 hours.
But the smell is just yummy I don't mind re-applying it!

Did anyone noticed it has most of the same notes as Princess by Vera Wang??

product_name: CK One Shock For Her Calvin Klein
review_content:
Forgot my perfume so I asked my friend if i can have a few spritz of hers. She handed me this.
